translation.en: [woman] In March of 1983,
a massive pulse of interstellar cosmic rays
struck the earth and its population.
translation.zh: ‎击中了地球和地球上的人类

translation.en: These cosmic rays triggered a genetic transformation in a select few…
translation.zh:
‎这种宇宙射线在少数特定人群中
‎触发了基因突变

translation.en: unleashing unimaginable superpowers.
translation.zh: ‎令他们体内释放出难以想象的超能力

translation.en: Unfortunately, these superpowers were only unlocked in rare individuals,
translation.zh:
‎不幸的是 只有极少数人的超能力
‎获得了释放

translation.en: who were genetically predisposed to be sociopaths.
translation.zh: ‎都是那些先天具有反社会人格的人

translation.en: These new superhumans came to be known…
as Miscreants.
What is that?
Oh, no!
My parents were among those caught in the crossfire.
translation.zh:
‎我父母成了灾难中被殃及的
‎无辜受害者

translation.en: I vowed that day to make it my life's mission to stop the Miscreants.
translation.zh:
‎那一天 我发誓要倾尽毕生精力
‎阻止恶徒

translation.en: [man] Everything we go over today
translation.zh: ‎所以 我们今天讲到的知识

translation.en: will be on the test tomorrow. Okay?
Lydia, wake up. [knocking on desk]
There she is.
Uh, sorry, Mr. Emerson.
Who can tell me what subject-verb agreement means?
translation.zh: ‎谁能告诉我 主谓一致是什么意思？

translation.en: Emily, only been in school for one week, hand's always up.
translation.zh: ‎艾米莉 你来了才一周 每次都举手

translation.en: Let's give someone else a chance.
Anyone? How about Lydia? Sleeping Beauty back there.
-Is the answer 11? -Incredibly incorrect.
translation.zh:
‎-答案是11吗？
‎-大错特错 不对

translation.en: No. Anyone else?
translation.zh:
‎-答案是11吗？
‎-大错特错 不对 ‎还有谁？

translation.en: Emily, take it away.
Subject-verb agreement means that both the subject and verb must agree in number.
translation.zh:
‎主谓一致的意思是 主语和动词的
‎单复数必须一致

translation.en: This means both need to be singular or both need to be plural.
translation.zh:
‎也就是说 它们应该或者都是单数
‎或者都是复数

translation.en: Right again, great.
You suck.
Wayne, Wayne, I heard it, pal.
We don't do that. We don't take that kind of guff. Detention.
translation.zh: ‎我的课堂上不许骂人 你放学后留下

translation.en: -Mr. Emerson, quick question. -Yeah?
translation.zh:
‎-爱默生老师 我有个简单的问题
‎-好

translation.en: So, I can't say, "Wayne is a stupid bags of crap,"
translation.zh: ‎所以 我不能说“韦恩是一群蠢货”

translation.en: I have to say, "Wayne is a stupid bag of crap"?
Shut up, Lydia.
Grammatically nailed it, but that's detention.
translation.zh:
‎语法上来说 你说对了
‎但你也要放学后留下

translation.en: Worth it.
[Mr. Emerson] Verbs and nouns agreeing.
[Emily] Stop it.
No. It's not fair your parents got iced by some Miscreants and we're stuck with you.
translation.zh:
‎不 你爸妈被恶徒干掉了
‎你就赖在我们这里不走 这不公平

translation.en: You think you're so smart. Always showing off in class.
translation.zh: ‎你以为你很聪明 总是在课堂上显摆

translation.en: Say you're a dork and I'll leave you alone.
translation.zh: ‎说你是书呆子 我就放过你

translation.en: -Say it. -Say it, nerd!
I'm not a nerd. I'm smart. There's a difference.
translation.zh: ‎我不是书呆子 我很聪明 二者有区别

translation.en: Wayne, got shit in your ears? She didn't wanna say it.
translation.zh: ‎韦恩 你耳聋吗？她说她不想说

translation.en: She's gonna. Don't think I won't hit a girl, Lydia.
translation.zh:
‎她非说不可
‎别以为你是女生 我就不敢打你

translation.en: -[kids gasp] -Don't think a girl won't hit you, Wayne.
translation.zh: ‎别以为我是女生 就不能打你 韦恩

translation.en: Now, get in that dumpster.
-What? Why? -'Cause that's where the garbage goes.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？为什么？
‎-因为垃圾都要进垃圾箱

translation.en: No way!
Do it, dipshit!
Okay.
Anyone else want in?
Yeah, you're alright.
-Um, wanna go to the swings? -Okay.
I'm sorry about your parents.
If I had superpowers, I'd beat the crap out of whoever did it to them.
translation.zh:
‎如果我有超能力
‎我一定会把凶手痛揍一顿

translation.en: Thanks.
How cool would it be, though, to be, like, a super person?
translation.zh:
‎不过 要是能成为一个超人类
‎那该多好啊

translation.en: More like a hero, I guess,
but I think I'd be a pretty kick-ass superhero.
translation.zh: ‎或者不如说是英雄 ‎我想我会是一个牛逼的超级英雄

translation.en: My parents were working on a way to turn regular people into superheroes.
translation.zh: ‎那就是我父母的研究课题 ‎如何把普通人变成超级英雄

translation.en: They were geneticists.
Wait, both of them were lady part doctors?
translation.zh: ‎他们都是研究怎么生小孩的？

translation.en: No, that's a gynecologist.
Geneticists are scientists who work on genes,
translation.zh: ‎遗传学家是研究基因的科学家

translation.en: including mutated ones.
Yeah, I knew that.
I'm testing you.
It would've been cool if they could've turned people to superheroes.
translation.zh:
‎要是他们能把普通人变成超级英雄
‎那该多好啊

translation.en: I mean, someone's gotta fight against those Miscreants.
I'm gonna do that someday.
translation.zh: ‎将来有一天 我要那么做

translation.en: -Do you wanna hang out after school? -Sure.
-What do you like to do? -Read.
Oh. You weren't kidding. Okay. [laughs]
-Hey! -Hey.
I made us friendship bracelets. Now we're officially friends.
translation.zh:
‎我给我们做了一对友谊手串
‎现在 我们正式成为朋友了

translation.en: Bet your ass we are.
[woman] Emily, would you like to say grace?
translation.zh: ‎艾米莉 你来念祈祷词好吗？ ‎（五年后）

translation.en: Emily?
Emily Rose Stanton!
-I'm… I'm sorry, what? -What are you reading about anyway?
translation.zh:
‎-对不起 什么？
‎-你看什么呢？

translation.en: Weak nuclear force.
-I'll say grace. -Thank you, Lydia.
Uh, okay. Uh…
Thanks, Lord, for making such kick-ass food.
translation.zh: ‎感谢上帝 赐给我们这么牛逼的美食

translation.en: If Jesus was here, he would crush it.
translation.zh: ‎如果耶稣在这里 他会都吃光的

translation.en: -[bell rings] -[Lydia] Van Halen's playing Grant Park.
translation.zh: ‎范海伦乐队今晚在格兰特公园演出

translation.en: There's a break in the fence. I could sneak us in.
translation.zh:
‎围墙有一段破了
‎我们可以从那里溜进去

translation.en: -I can't. I have a paper due next week. -So?
translation.zh:
‎-我不能去 我下周有篇论文要交
‎-那又怎样？

translation.en: -Knock-knock. -Who's there?
-Clyde. -Wait, what?
Wait, I think I told it wrong.
Clyde, if you can't tell a joke, you'll never get a lady. That's factual.
translation.zh:
‎克莱德 你要是连笑话都不会说
‎那你永远也泡不到女朋友

translation.en: Challenge accepted.
-Bye, Clyde. -[Lydia] Come on, Em.
translation.zh:
‎-再见 克莱德
‎-去吧 艾米莉

translation.en: Van Halen. It'll be fun.
translation.zh: ‎是范海伦啊 会很好玩的

translation.en: It would be. But I have to stick to the plan.
translation.zh: ‎的确会很好玩 但我得遵循计划安排

translation.en: Come on, Emily.
-There's the girl. Where have you been? -Studying.
translation.zh:
‎-你在这儿啊 你去哪儿了？
‎-我在学习啊

translation.en: -You've been in your cave for weeks. -AP exams in the morning.
translation.zh:
‎-你都闭关好几个礼拜了
‎-明天上午有预修课程考试

translation.en: Super aware of that.
If I don't get perfect scores, I won't finish what my parents started…
translation.zh:
‎我要是考不好 就不能完成
‎我父母未完成的工作

translation.en: [both] …and give people power to fight Miscreants.
I know, I know.
But you're gonna do fine. You're gonna crack from the stress though.
translation.zh:
‎但你会考好的 ‎但你压力太大 会吃不消的
‎所以我来了

translation.en: That's why I'm here.
translation.zh:
‎但你压力太大 会吃不消的
‎所以我来了

translation.en: How about you get 30 minutes of shut-eye,
I'll wake you, and you'll be ready for round two.
translation.zh:
‎然后我叫醒你
‎你也好精神百倍继续学习啊

translation.en: Don't worry. I got your back. Trust me.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 有我呢 相信我吧

translation.en: No! Oh my god, I am late. You were supposed to wake me up.
translation.zh:
‎不好！天呐 我睡过了
‎你应该叫醒我的

translation.en: Oh, wow, that did not go like I planned at all.
translation.zh: ‎我计划得挺好 没想到会这样

translation.en: I can't do this anymore. I'm trying to do something with my life.
translation.zh:
‎我不能再这样下去了
‎我不能虚度人生

translation.en: Hey, I'm sorry, I messed up.
Sorry isn't enough. I have important things to accomplish.
translation.zh:
‎对不起也没用
‎我有重要的使命要去完成

translation.en: I can't be stuck in this neighborhood.
-What's wrong with that? -I can't let you drag me down.
translation.zh:
‎-这里怎么了？
‎-我不能让你拖累我

translation.en: Drag you? I'm always looking out for you. I'm the only reason you have any fun.
translation.zh:
‎我还一直照顾你呢
‎因为我 你的生活才有乐趣

translation.en: I owe it to my parents to be special.
translation.zh: ‎为了我父母 我一定要出类拔萃

translation.en: We all know I'm not special.
-I didn't say that. -It's fine.
You don't know how life is gonna go.
I could be the president, getting chauffeured in limousines.
translation.zh:
‎没准我会当总统
‎到哪儿去都坐豪华专车

translation.en: Come on, come on!
You're welcome, double shift.
Hey, Tito! Quit leaving candy wrappers in my rig!
translation.zh: ‎蒂托！以后别把糖纸扔在我车上！

translation.en: [officer] Bank robbery in progress. Suspect is a Miscreant.
translation.zh: ‎有人抢劫银行 疑犯是恶徒

translation.en: [officer] Look for a black pickup truck.
[silently mouthing] What the f--
Oh my god!
[officer] Anyone hurt?
-You guys okay? -Yeah.
Yeah, who blows up an angel?
God!
So, what's new, Frank?
I got no business.
People are afraid to… to leave the house. All this fighting, all this crime.
translation.zh:
‎人们不敢出门 到处打打杀杀
‎这么多犯罪活动

translation.en: The Miscreants are winning, Lydia.
translation.zh: ‎莉迪亚 没人打得过恶徒

translation.en: Tell me about it.
I can't even pay to fix my window.
Well, I'll help you put in a new plate of glass this weekend.
Just have to… go to this reunion.
Thanks. Um…
You think Emily will come?
I don't know. I don't talk to her anymore, and you know it.
translation.zh: ‎不知道 我和她没联系 你知道

translation.en: Why don't you call and see if she wants to come?
translation.zh:
‎为什么不给她打个电话呢
‎问问她要不要来？

translation.en: I wouldn't know how to, even if I wanted to.
translation.zh:
‎为什么不给她打个电话呢
‎问问她要不要来？ ‎-就算我想联系她 我也不知怎么联系
‎-真的？

translation.en: Oh, really?
translation.zh:
‎-就算我想联系她 我也不知怎么联系
‎-真的？

translation.en: I'm not saying I would. I'm just saying I wouldn't--
translation.zh: ‎我不是说我要联系 我是说我不会…

translation.en: Norma stopped by a while ago. I got her number for you.
translation.zh: ‎诺玛刚来过 我替你要来了她的电话

translation.en: Pretty creepy, Frank.
Maybe Emily will say no, but you don't know unless you ask.
translation.zh:
‎也许艾米莉会拒绝
‎但你不问 就永远也不会知道

translation.en: You know, it's like trying to skip a rock in a lake.
translation.zh: ‎这就像在湖边拿石头打水漂

translation.en: You know the lake's gonna eat it.
It took you half an hour to find the right flat rock,
translation.zh:
‎你花了半个小时
‎才找到一块扁平的石头

translation.en: but you gotta throw it.
Otherwise, you're not gonna know if it's gonna skip.
translation.zh: ‎不然你不知道它能不能在水面上跳跃

translation.en: But sure enough, you throw the rock, zing, it goes right into the water.
translation.zh:
‎于是你把石头扔出去
‎它直接落进水里了

translation.en: Okay, let's go underwater.
There's a big salmon swimming by.
The rock flies in, beans the salmon in the head.
translation.zh: ‎石头飞过去 正中鲑鱼的脑袋

translation.en: Dead as a doornail. -Floats to the top. -Jesus.
translation.zh:
‎-死翘翘 漂起来了
‎-上帝啊

translation.en: -That's not the worst of it. -Is there more?
The salmon's a female.
Loaded with little eggs. Just like the Titanic, they're all dead.
translation.zh:
‎怀了一肚子鱼子
‎就像泰坦尼克号 全死光了

translation.en: In this, am I the rock, or who's the-- In this situation?
translation.zh: ‎在你的比喻里 我是那块石头？谁是…

translation.en: You could be the rock,
you could be the fish,
you could be the thrower of the stone.
-You could be the lake. -Okay.
Food for thought.
Or not.
You're bleak, Frank.
I worry about ya, but you do make a hell of a pancake.
translation.zh: ‎我为你担心 但是你做的薄饼真好吃

translation.en: -Thanks. -See you tomorrow?
Yeah. Hey, you be careful out there.
Yeah, you too.
It'd be great if she came, though.
translation.zh: ‎不过 她要是能来就好了

translation.en: Yeah.
Emojis.
You're alright.
[quietly] God! Is that the milk?
[quietly] "Nice to hear from you."
translation.zh: ‎“嗨 收到你的短信真高兴”

translation.en: Awesome!
You know what?
Let's thin that out. That'll fix her up.
translation.zh: ‎我们稀释一下 这样就行了

translation.en: It did not fix her up.
Is it the milk or the cereal?
It's the milk.
♪ Going down The only road I've ever known ♪
Dang it, Em.
[reporter] There's been an assassination attempt on the King,
translation.zh:
‎人称“国王”的物流大亨 亿万富翁
‎险遭行刺

translation.en: the shipping magnate and billionaire who is opposing Rachel Gonzales
translation.zh:
‎在即将到来的芝加哥市长选举中
‎他和瑞秋冈萨雷斯

translation.en: -in the upcoming Chicago mayoral race. -Almost every day.
translation.zh:
‎是竞选对手 ‎-几乎每天都有事
‎-今天早些时候

translation.en: Earlier today, a campaign speech by William "The King" Stevens,
translation.zh:
‎-几乎每天都有事
‎-今天早些时候 ‎“国王”威廉史蒂文斯发表竞选演说时

translation.en: was violently interrupted by an explosive blast from the Miscreant known as Laser.
translation.zh: ‎遭遇人称“激光女”的恶徒爆炸袭击

translation.en: You're the worst.
-Right? Isn't she the worst? -…gripped the crowd of supporters.
Immediately after the attack, The King made this statement.
translation.zh: ‎袭击发生后 国王立即发表了声明

translation.en: You know, I could have lost my life today,
but I have a message for that Miscreant named Laser.
translation.zh: ‎但我对那个叫激光女的恶徒有话说

translation.en: You may have taken out this podium, but you will never take out The King.
translation.zh:
‎你摧毁了这座讲台
‎但你永远无法摧毁国王

translation.en: The King's lead over Miss Gonzales has been reduced to ten points,
translation.zh:
‎国王对冈萨雷斯女士的领先优势
‎已经缩小到了十个点

translation.en: making this the closest the race has been since both nominees…
translation.zh: ‎两位候选人之间的差距从没这么小…

translation.en: Come on, Em. Where are you?
In other news, our city's prodigal daughter, Emily Stanton, has returned,
translation.zh:
‎离乡远游的艾米莉斯坦顿
‎回到了芝加哥

translation.en: with a new headquarters for her company, Stanton 4.0,
translation.zh:
‎在本市建立了她的公司新总部
‎斯坦顿4.0

translation.en: right here in downtown Chicago.
Way to go, Em.
-Emily's building is epic. -Yeah.
No wonder she's not coming to our reunion.
I wish she was here.
She's probably hangin' out with strippers, sippin' smooth champagne,
translation.zh: ‎她可能正和脱衣舞男一起花天酒地呢

translation.en: eatin' nachos filled with goose meat or something.
Clyde, you have a really weird vision of how rich people live.
translation.zh: ‎克莱德 你对富人生活的想象很奇特

translation.en: Do you wanna hear a joke?
-I'm good. -Remember you told me a long time ago,
translation.zh:
‎-不想
‎-记得吗？很久以前你说过

translation.en: "If you can't tell a joke, you won't get a lady." Let me tell one.
translation.zh:
‎“如果不会讲笑话 就泡不到女朋友”
‎听我讲一个吧

translation.en: -Knock-knock. -Who's there?
I'm an owl.
I'm an owl who?
I botched the owl thing.
I think I'm the owl, and I think…
Okay, knock-knock.
-Who's there? -I'm an owl.
-I'm an owl, hoo! -I'm an owl who?
That can't work because you say that part. Right?
translation.zh:
‎这样不行 因为这句话是你说的
‎对不对？

translation.en: -Unless we're both owls. -That could be funny. Is that funny?
translation.zh:
‎-除非我们俩都是浮云
‎-那样也很好笑啊 是不是很好笑？

translation.en: -Oh, I got it. -Okay.
-Knock-knock. -Who's there?
I'm an owl. Shut up.
That's it. You don't do the second part.
You just break tradition.
Okay, cool. Uh…
I'm gonna go surprise Emily. I'm gonna bring her back here.
translation.zh: ‎我去给艾米莉一个惊喜 我把她带来

translation.en: -Awesome. -She probably just needs a wingman.
translation.zh:
‎-好极了
‎-她可能需要有人给她壮胆

translation.en: Yeah. I'll be here. I'm gonna crack this nut.
translation.zh: ‎我留在这儿 我要把这个笑话讲好

translation.en: Okay. If not, that's cool.
I'm an owl, who?
I'm an owl, whose?
She's the owl.
Way to go, Em.
Whoa! Hey, how you doin'?
-Hi. -Hi. Uh, I'm here to see Emily Stanton.
translation.zh:
‎-嗨
‎-嗨 我来找艾米莉斯坦顿

translation.en: Oh. Sorry, it's after hours. Do you have an appointment?
translation.zh: ‎对不起 现在下班了 你有预约吗？

translation.en: No. I don't have a… an appointment, but I'm Lydia Berman.
translation.zh: ‎没有 我没预约 但我是莉迪亚波曼

translation.en: I'm her best friend, so… I mean, we're not currently,
translation.zh:
‎我是她最好的朋友 所以…我是说
‎我们目前

translation.en: what I would say, "best friends" or "friends."
translation.zh: ‎不能说是“最好的朋友”或者“朋友”

translation.en: Estranged, I think, puts a stink on it, that it might not warrant.
translation.zh:
‎我们疏远了 这样说可能不好听
‎可能不能算朋友了

translation.en: But I guess you could say we're estranged now,
translation.zh:
‎但我猜你也许可以说
‎我们现在是已经疏远了

translation.en: but not in a way that's, like, restraining order.
translation.zh: ‎但我们之间也并没有禁制令

translation.en: -So, do I just go up and surprise her? -No, you definitely don't do that.
translation.zh:
‎-所以 我能上去给她一个惊喜吗？
‎-绝对不可以

translation.en: Okay, but I'd like to go up and… take her…
translation.zh: ‎好吧 但我想上去把她带走…

translation.en: not by force,
to her high school reunion.
So, just, you know, Lydia Berman.
translation.zh: ‎所以 就说是莉迪亚波曼

translation.en: She'll be like, "Cool."
Lydia Berman.
Hello. There's a Lydia Berman here to see Miss Stanton.
translation.zh: ‎有个莉迪亚波曼要见斯坦顿女士

translation.en: Says she's here to take her to her high school reunion.
translation.zh: ‎她说是来带她去参加高中同学会的

translation.en: I'm here to take her--
-I said that. -She doesn't go to parties on her own.
translation.zh:
‎-我刚说了
‎-她不喜欢单独去参加派对

translation.en: Wow, really?
That is surprising to hear. I will send her up.
translation.zh: ‎没想到 我这就让她上去

translation.en: Well, she will see you. I'm kinda relieved that's the answer.
translation.zh:
‎-她可以见你了
‎-这个答复让我松了一口气

translation.en: Not how I thought that one was gonna go.
translation.zh: ‎我也没想到会是这样的结果

translation.en: -Thanks, man. Hi. -[woman] Hello.
Miss Berman. Hi, I'm Jessie.
Hi. You can just call me Lydia. It's my name.
translation.zh:
‎你好 叫我莉迪亚就行了
‎这是我的名字

translation.en: Whoa, this place is taters.
Look at this thing.
Goes all the way-- I mean, how do you change a bulb in something like that?
translation.zh: ‎这么高 你们怎么换灯泡啊？

translation.en: Uh, that would be a maintenance question.
translation.zh: ‎这是个关于大厦维护的问题

translation.en: Maintenance. There you go. Wow.
Well, Miss Stanton is working at the moment,
translation.zh:
‎斯坦顿女士正在工作
‎但她很快就会过来的

translation.en: but she should be available momentarily. Is there anything I can get?
translation.zh:
‎斯坦顿女士正在工作
‎但她很快就会过来的 ‎你想来点什么？

translation.en: Can I get, like, an ice-cold brewski?
It's just gonna take the edge off, 'cause I'm kinda, like, clammy…
translation.zh: ‎也许能让我放松一点 我有点冒汗…

translation.en: -Clamming out, if you get me, so… -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-汗津津的 也许你懂的 所以…
‎-好的

translation.en: Ah, thank you, Jessie.
[Emily] Hey, Lydi. Good to see you.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 莉迪亚 见到你真高兴

translation.en: Hi.
Long time, huh?
Yeah, it sure has been.
-You look good. -Oh.
Thanks. Yeah, you look, I mean, super classy.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 你看起来真是超有型

translation.en: Thanks.
So, uh…
what brings you by?
Well, I-- You know, we were texting, and… I mean, I texted you,
translation.zh:
‎我 你知道 我们那天互发短信…
‎我是说 我给你发过短信

translation.en: and then you… you wrote back about the reunion,
translation.zh: ‎然后你回了短信 关于同学会的事

translation.en: which was, is, tonight.
And I was there, and you hadn't gotten there yet, so I…
translation.zh: ‎我刚才在那边 你一直没去 所以我…

translation.en: I remembered that you never liked to go to parties solo, so I just thought I'd…
translation.zh:
‎我记得你从不喜欢一个人去参加派对
‎所以我想我…

translation.en: thought I'd swing by and see if you wanted me to go with you.
translation.zh:
‎我想来一趟
‎看看你想不想让我陪你去

translation.en: Was that tonight?
Oh, I'm sorry, Lydia.
I… I can't go to the reunion. I… I got caught up with work.
translation.zh: ‎我不能去同学会 工作抽不出身啊

translation.en: Oh, well, yeah, I bet. I mean, look at all this stuff.
It's like, "Beam me up, Scotty." Beep, beep, bop.
You know, I don't know what any of it does, but-- [gasps]
translation.zh:
‎我不知道这些东西都是干什么用的
‎但是…

translation.en: Oh god. I'm so sorry. Oh my god, this sweater's probably so expensive.
translation.zh: ‎天呐 真对不起 这件毛衫可能贵得很

translation.en: It's okay. I'll just change.
-I don't wanna ruin your shirt. -No, this shirt's, like, garbage.
translation.zh:
‎-我不希望你的衬衫被毁了
‎-不 这件衬衫就是垃圾

translation.en: Literally, I found it in the garbage, so I don't…
translation.zh: ‎真的 我在垃圾堆里捡的 所以我不…

translation.en: -I'm so sorry. -Oh.
I'll, uh, pay for dry cleaning--
No, no, no. I couldn't take your money.
But could you do me a favor and, um…
ooh, don't touch anything, uh, while I'm gone, please.
translation.zh: ‎我离开的时候 请不要碰任何东西

translation.en: -Yeah, what a-- -Not… not even… not even that.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 真是…
‎-这桌子也不要碰

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay?
I speaken ze English.
[Emily chuckles] Jessie!
I need you to keep an eye on things.
Oh, uh, she said that you're supposed to get me another cold beer right away.
translation.zh: ‎她说要你立刻再给我拿一杯冰啤酒

translation.en: Seemed kind of, like, mad. I think at you.
Good luck.
Alright, I'm… I'm on it. Anything else?
translation.zh: ‎好 我去拿 还要什么？

translation.en: -No, you're so sweet. -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-不用了 你真是好人
‎-好的

translation.en: [muttering quietly] Stupid.
Cool.
Whoa. What is all this?
Alright, remember, Lydia, you said you would not touch anything, so…
translation.zh:
‎记住 莉迪亚 你说过你什么也不会碰
‎所以…

translation.en: you should not.
What do you do?
Ooh, it's like old-school Atari.
translation.zh: ‎这好像老式雅达利游戏机啊

translation.en: -Let's see what she's got. Oh. -[device powering up]
It's a light switch. Pft. Big deal.
translation.zh: ‎灯的开关啊 有什么了不起

translation.en: Alright, I'm gonna sit, not touch anything else, and wait for my beer. [grunts]
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我这就坐下 不再碰任何东西
‎等我的啤酒

translation.en: No! Ow! Ow!
Whoa! This is the world's stupidest massage chair!
It's not a massage chair, you idiot.
translation.zh: ‎这不是按摩椅 你这傻瓜

translation.en: There has been a breach in the injection room.
-Get me out of here! -Dear god, Lydia. What have you done?
translation.zh:
‎-让我下去！
‎-天呐 莉迪亚 你干了什么？

translation.en: Emily, I didn't touch anything!
translation.zh:
‎艾米莉 我什么也没碰！
‎好吧 我碰了几个…

translation.en: [spluttering] Okay, I touched a couple-- I touched one thing. I'm so sorry…
translation.zh:
‎艾米莉 我什么也没碰！
‎好吧 我碰了几个… ‎我碰了一个东西 对不起

translation.en: [Emily, echoing] Twenty years of research down the drain. How could you leave her alone in the lab?
translation.zh:
‎20年的研究付诸东流 你怎么能
‎把她一个人留在实验室？

translation.en: [Jessie] She said you wanted me to get her another beer. I'm sorry, Miss Stanton.
translation.zh:
‎她说你让我再给她拿杯啤酒
‎斯坦顿女士

translation.en: Lydia, do you have any idea what you've done?
translation.zh: ‎莉迪亚 你知道你干了些什么吗？

translation.en: I've worked for this my entire life and you've ruined everything.
translation.zh: ‎这是我一辈子的心血 全被你毁了

translation.en: Oh, I don't know what was in those needles,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道那些针管里是什么

translation.en: but I'm totally happy to give it back to you.
I can, like, pee in a cup or something--
translation.zh: ‎我可以对着杯子撒泡尿 或者…

translation.en: You don't understand.
Tonight, I was going to begin treatments I've been working on my whole life.
translation.zh:
‎我用毕生精力开发了
‎一种机体改造方案 正要实施

translation.en: I developed a genetic sequencing platform
that can alter a human's biochemistry in unimaginable ways.
translation.zh:
‎能以难以想象的方式
‎改造人的生物化学属性

translation.en: I finally finished the work my parents started.
translation.zh: ‎我终于完成了我父母的工作

translation.en: I was going to find a way to stop the Miscreants.
translation.zh: ‎我本来会找到打败恶徒的办法

translation.en: I was going to become a super… person.
translation.zh: ‎我本来会成为一个超… 人

translation.en: That is awesome, Em.
I always knew you could do it.
What's your power?
They were supposed to be super strength and invisibility,
translation.zh: ‎本来应该是超强力量和隐身

translation.en: but you took her treatment for strength.
translation.zh:
‎但她实现超强力量的第一剂药
‎被你用掉了

translation.en: I'm really, really sorry. I didn't… I didn't mean to…
translation.zh: ‎真是太对不起了 我不是有意的

translation.en: Maybe you can just, like, cook up another batch.
translation.zh: ‎真是太对不起了 我不是有意的 ‎也许你可以再做一份

translation.en: It took five years to create that formula,
translation.zh: ‎这个配方用了五年才做出来

translation.en: and more importantly,
your body's undergoing a molecular change from the injections.
translation.zh:
‎注射之后 你的身体已经开始
‎发生分子层面的变化了

translation.en: Your cardiovascular system has been increased by 1,000%.
translation.zh: ‎你的心血管系统增强了百分之一千

translation.en: It's how those intense boils on your face have already healed themselves.
translation.zh:
‎所以你脸上的严重烫伤
‎才能这么快自愈

translation.en: Lydia, the process has started.
translation.zh: ‎莉迪亚 改造过程已经开始了

translation.en: Well, that's not… very soothing to hear.
translation.zh: ‎这话听起来有些令人不安啊

translation.en: I mean, I feel weird and sweaty, and…
translation.zh: ‎我感觉怪怪的 浑身冒汗

translation.en: my heart's poundin' like a jackhammer inside my chest because of this serum.
translation.zh:
‎我的心脏咚咚地狂跳
‎这都是因为那药水

translation.en: -What does that mean? -If you stop taking the treatments,
translation.zh:
‎-这意味着什么呢？
‎-如果你不继续接受药物注射

translation.en: your veins will shred like a log in a wood chipper.
translation.zh:
‎你的血管就会粉碎
‎像木头扔进粉碎机里一样

translation.en: Jessie, could you report to security?
translation.zh: ‎杰西 请你去保安部一下

translation.en: Of course.
Emily, the only logical thing to do is stay the course.
translation.zh:
‎艾米莉 唯一符合逻辑的选择
‎就是继续做下去

translation.en: We'll continue with the super strength treatments with the village idiot here
translation.zh:
‎我们继续给这个乡下白痴
‎实施超强力量的改造

translation.en: and you begin the treatments for invisibility.
translation.zh: ‎你开始接受隐身能力的改造

translation.en: "Village idiot?"
Hello, Chicago is a city, not a village, and the best city in the world.
translation.zh:
‎芝加哥可是个城市啊 不是乡下
‎而且是全世界最好的城市

translation.en: -The Bears, the Cubs-- -Not the time, Lydia.
translation.zh:
‎-芝加哥熊队、芝加哥小熊队…
‎-现在不是时候

translation.en: -There is no other way, is there? -No, Emily. You know that.
translation.zh:
‎-没有别的办法 对吧？
‎-没有 艾米莉

translation.en: -Em, let's show you to your room. -Wait a minute, I'm not staying here.
translation.zh:
‎-我们带你去你的房间
‎-等等 我不能住在这里

translation.en: I've got stuff to do. I got work on Monday. I've got good Bulls tickets.
translation.zh:
‎我还有事 周一还要上班
‎我还买了公牛队的球票

translation.en: If you stop the treatments,
it's entirely possible that your body will violently explode over the weekend.
translation.zh: ‎很可能你的身体在本周末就会爆炸

translation.en: I can take a peek at a room, you know.
This looks like the jail cell on Battlestar Galactica.
translation.zh:
‎好像《太空堡垒卡拉狄加》
‎里面的牢房啊

translation.en: -Alright, come on, come on, come on. -Alright.
The room is furnished in a non-distracting manner to help with your recovery.
translation.zh:
‎房间的布置采用无干扰家居模式
‎有助于你的康复

translation.en: Somebody tell me who Urkel is.
-What's an Urkel? -Not "what's," "who's" an Urkel.
translation.zh:
‎-厄蔻尔是什么？
‎-厄蔻尔不是“什么” 厄蔻尔是“谁”？

translation.en: It's Urkel's… Urkel. Tell her who Urkel is.
translation.zh: ‎就是厄蔻尔…告诉她厄蔻尔是谁

translation.en: How do you not-- Oh my god.
You got glasses and suspenders, you know, and you seem super smart.
translation.zh: ‎你戴眼镜 穿背带裤 你好像超级聪明

translation.en: -Let me search. -You know who Urkel is.
translation.zh:
‎-我搜一下
‎-你知道厄蔻尔是谁

translation.en: -How do you spell that? -You spell it Ur-kel.
[imitating Urkel] "Did I do that?"
Right? Does that ring a-- "Did I do that?"
translation.zh: ‎对吧？想起来没…“这是我干的吗？”

translation.en: "Did I do that?" You know that.
translation.zh: ‎“这是我干的吗？” 你知道啊

translation.en: "Did I… did I do that?"
Mom, is she having a reaction to the injection?
translation.zh:
‎妈妈
‎这是接受注射后的不良反应吗？

translation.en: No, she's always like this.
Did you say "Mom"?
"Mom"? You have a ki-- You…
You have a kid and I didn't even know it?
-You have a secret kid for 20 years? -I'm only 15.
translation.zh:
‎-20年来 你偷偷摸摸地有个女儿？
‎-我才15岁

translation.en: Well, I don't know that 'cause she never told me!
translation.zh: ‎我不知道啊 因为她从没告诉我！

translation.en: We don't have time for any of this.
What is Jodie Foster's problem? Allie helped me set up this whole lab.
translation.zh:
‎-乔迪福斯特有什么毛病啊？
‎-这座实验室是艾丽帮我建立的

translation.en: She's former CIA. She runs things for me.
translation.zh: ‎她以前在中情局 现在她帮我管理

translation.en: Wh-- What? It's a compliment.
I'm saying Jodie Foster, like, "It puts the lotion in the basket,"
translation.zh:
‎我说的是《沉默的羔羊》里的
‎乔迪福斯特

translation.en: not "Tay in the wind" Jodie Foster.
-Tay in the what? -Tay in the wind. Ta--
translation.zh:
‎-风中的什么？
‎-风中的树 风…

translation.en: "Tay in the wind! Tay in the wind!" Nell?
-Who's Nell? -"Who's Nell?" Who's Nell?
translation.zh:
‎-内尔是谁？
‎-“内尔是谁？”内尔是谁？

translation.en: Jodie Foster, 1994.
Jodie Foster knows it's Jodie Foster! How do you not know "Tay in the wind"?
translation.zh:
‎乔迪福斯特知道我是说乔迪福斯特！
‎你们怎么会不知道“风中的树”？

translation.en: We have clean women's clothing for you. Everything you could possibly need,
translation.zh:
‎我们有干净的女装
‎你可能会需要的任何东西 这里都有

translation.en: and we will burn what you are wearing at the first opportunity.
translation.zh:
‎我们一有机会
‎就会把你现在穿的这身衣服烧掉

translation.en: -Nobody's touchin' this. -Yes, we are.
translation.zh:
‎-这件衣服谁也别动
‎-我们会动的

translation.en: This is an authentic 1994 Slayer concert T-shirt,
translation.zh: ‎这是正版1994年杀手乐队演唱会T恤

translation.en: bought in stadium, and if anybody touches any of this,
translation.zh: ‎现场购买的 谁要是敢动一下

translation.en: I'm sorry, I know you're young, I'll murder all of you.
translation.zh:
‎对不起 我知道你还年轻
‎但我会杀掉你们所有人

translation.en: Okay. Well, before we get there, this device is for you.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 在那之前 这个设备是给你的

translation.en: If you need anything,
-someone will be on call. -Why aren't you in school?
translation.zh:
‎-随时有人值班
‎-你怎么不在学校？

translation.en: First, it's the middle of the night,
and second of all, I graduated from Stanford last year.
translation.zh: ‎其次 我去年就从斯坦福毕业了

translation.en: Wow, she's a chip off the old nerd block.
She's not a nerd. She's smart. [both] There's a difference.
translation.zh: ‎她不是书呆子 她很聪明 二者有区别

translation.en: And she helps us out a lot around here. She's great with tech.
translation.zh:
‎她在这里给了我们很大帮助
‎她在技术方面很厉害

translation.en: -Can I see your wrist for a second? -Okay.
translation.zh:
‎-手腕伸出来一下 好吗？
‎-好吧

translation.en: This is so we can monitor your vitals as you recover and train.
translation.zh:
‎这东西让我们在你康复和受训过程中
‎可以监测你的生命指征

translation.en: -Heart rate, blood pressure… -[beep]
I've had something similar, but on my ankle--
translation.zh:
‎我以前也戴过类似的东西
‎不过他们是给我戴在脚踝…

translation.en: Lydia, she's 15. Let's monitor our stories.
translation.zh: ‎莉迪亚 她才15岁 我们说话注意一点

translation.en: Got it.
-You play Fortnite? -Yes--
-No. -[Lydia] What's your handle?
T-Wagon-14.
Mine's L-Train-631-Harper-Avenue- Apartment-7B.
Wait, is that your address?
Oh my god, don't put your address online.
translation.zh: ‎别把你的地址公开到网上啊

translation.en: I'm not putting my address online.
translation.zh: ‎我没把我的地址公开到网上

translation.en: I'm at 7A. 7B is my asshole neighbor, Steve.
translation.zh:
‎我住7A
‎7B是我那个讨厌的邻居史蒂夫

translation.en: If somebody's gonna get whacked, it's him.
translation.zh: ‎所以 如果有人被揍 也是他

translation.en: We should play. But I gotta warn you. I play dirty!
translation.zh:
‎我们应该一起玩 但我要警告你
‎我可是不守规矩的！

translation.en: I am unbelievably bored.
See you in the morning. We start at 5:00 a.m.
translation.zh: ‎明天早上见 我们5点开始

translation.en: 5:00 a.m.? Bullshit.
Uh, I don't start at 5:00 a.m.
[device beeps] It's 5:00 a.m. Time to get up.
[Emily] Okay, let's get started.
After a series of treatments,
I'm estimating that we can increase your ATP by 10,000%.
translation.zh:
‎我估计我们可以让你的三磷酸腺苷
‎增加百分之一万

translation.en: Everything about you will become stronger, including your skin,
translation.zh:
‎你身体的一切都会变得更强壮
‎包括你的皮肤

translation.en: your vascular and skeletal systems, making it more difficult to hurt you.
translation.zh:
‎你的血管和骨骼系统
‎让你更不容易受伤

translation.en: And I'm estimating that you'll be able to lift 20,000 pounds.
translation.zh:
‎此外 我预计你将
‎可以举起9000公斤的重物

translation.en: Roughly the weight of a city bus.
translation.zh: ‎差不多是一辆公交车的重量

translation.en: Oh my god, I'm gonna throw the shit out of a city bus.
translation.zh: ‎我操 我要把公交车扔出去

translation.en: Language.
I'm gonna throw the pee crap out of a city bus.
translation.zh: ‎我靠 我要把公交车扔出去

translation.en: That isn't better and you're not gonna be throwing a bus.
translation.zh:
‎还是不怎么样
‎而且你也不能乱扔公交车

translation.en: -That would be very bad. -[Lydia silently mouthing]
[Emily] Okay.
First, I need you to lift this mallet and hit the block.
translation.zh: ‎首先 我要你举起这把大锤 砸这块板

translation.en: We'll monitor your vitals and results to get our baseline.
translation.zh:
‎我们会监测你的体征和结果
‎从而得出我们的基线

translation.en: -Why does it look like a carnival thing? -Because I'm fun.
translation.zh:
‎-这怎么像是游乐园的玩具？
‎-因为我很风趣

translation.en: Okay.
Yeah.
Here goes nothin'.
I think I sprained my groin. Do chicks have groins?
translation.zh:
‎我好像扭伤了我的腹股沟
‎女生有腹股沟吗？

translation.en: -Yes. -[Lydia] That's what I did.
I might have just peed just a little bit in my suit too.
According to this, your bladder did release urine.
translation.zh:
‎从这里看 你的膀胱
‎的确排出了一些尿液

translation.en: [exhales] Great first day, everybody. I'll catch you tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎第一天成绩不错 我们明天见

translation.en: I-- No, no, no. We are just getting started.
translation.zh: ‎不 不 我们才刚开始

translation.en: Now that we have a baseline, it's time to start your treatment.
translation.zh:
‎现在我们有了基线
‎可以开始你的每日注射了

translation.en: It's not gonna like yesterday, is it?
[Emily] Not at all.
translation.zh: ‎不会像昨天那样了吧？ ‎绝对不会 每次给药都是完全不同的

translation.en: Each treatment is completely unique.
translation.zh: ‎绝对不会 每次给药都是完全不同的

translation.en: And it's safe, right?
Oh my god, are they safe? It's a miracle you're still alive.
translation.zh:
‎上帝啊 是安全的吗？
‎你现在还活着 已经是奇迹了

translation.en: There can be possible complications with any treatment.
translation.zh:
‎任何给药行为都可能
‎带来一些不良反应

translation.en: Giving you super strength has inevitable risks.
translation.zh:
‎给你超强力量的同时
‎也有不可避免的风险

translation.en: -Like what? -Oh…
Like death, amnesia, paralysis, stroke, brain death,
translation.zh:
‎比如死亡、失忆、瘫痪、中风、
‎脑死亡

translation.en: living inside your mind, unable to speak or convey thoughts,
translation.zh:
‎心里都明白
‎可是不能说话或表达思想

translation.en: which would be the most unspeakable pain, which we simply abbreviate as--
translation.zh: ‎那将是最不可言喻的痛苦 ‎我们只把它简称为“不可言喻”

translation.en: [all] "The unspeakable."
translation.zh: ‎我们只把它简称为“不可言喻”

translation.en: -And did I say death? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-还有 我说过死亡了吗？
‎-说了

translation.en: You know, I'm scrambling to find the silver lining here.
What is it? At least I don't have diarrhea.
translation.zh:
‎就没有一点好的吗？
‎至少我不会腹泻吧

translation.en: Severe diarrhea is a given.
-That one right there is 100% a certainty. -Oh my god.
translation.zh:
‎-这是百分之百会发生的
‎-天呐

translation.en: Look, I'll do everything in my power to keep you safe.
I'm doing this for my parents, for this city.
translation.zh:
‎我这么做是为了我的父母
‎为了这座城市

translation.en: Let's get swole and kick some Miscreant butt.
translation.zh:
‎那我们来练出些大肌肉吧
‎好好教训那些恶徒

translation.en: Son of a…
You said it wasn't gonna be anything like it was yesterday.
I meant metabolically speaking.
Actually, the delivery method is exactly the same.

translation.en: I'm burning! My face is on fire!
That should be over in two seconds.
Oh, yeah.
Oh, that was-- I mean, you said it, but it's actually…

translation.en: It's even cool to the touch.
How about you go pick up that mallet and hit that thing again?

translation.en: I don't wanna, because I just got a bazillion needles injected in my face.

translation.zh:
‎莉迪亚 试试吧
‎应该会有立竿见影的效果

‎好吧 保护好你们那两坨子肉

translation.en: What are ta-tas?
-Never mind. -Okay.
Well, that's a stone-cold bummer.
That's really good for only your second treatment.
translation.zh:
‎你第二次接受注射就能这样
‎真的很好了

translation.en: What do you mean? How many treatments are there?
translation.zh: ‎你说什么？一共要注射多少次？

translation.en: -Thirty-three. -Oh my god.
[device] It's 5:00 a.m. Time to get up.
Get outta here.
Why my boobs?
For this course of treatment,
it's important to inject through the breast tissue into the pectoral muscle.
translation.zh:
‎必须通过乳房组织注射进去
‎达到胸肌

translation.en: -When are we gonna start your treatments? -Right now, actually.
translation.zh:
‎-我们什么时候给你下药啊？
‎-就现在

translation.en: Here you go, Miss Stanton.
-Thank you, Jessie. -Wait, it's a pill?
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢 杰西
‎-等等 就一颗药丸？

translation.en: Your whole treatment is… one stinking pill?
It's a very large pill, and I had to go off dairy for this.
translation.zh: ‎很大的药丸 而且我还得忌乳制品

translation.en: [device] It's 5:00 a.m. Time to get up.
Alright, hold on to your ta-tas, Bill.
Totally meant to do that.
Yeah, I'm good.
It appears that Laser's reign of destruction will never end,
translation.zh:
‎看起来
‎激光女的破坏活动永远不会停止

translation.en: keeping our city on edge.
The Chicago White Sox and Cubs have suspended weekend baseball games
translation.zh: ‎由于她近来的致命性破坏活动增多

translation.en: due to the increase in her recent lethal activities.
translation.zh:
‎芝加哥白袜队和小熊队
‎暂停了周末的棒球比赛

translation.en: Meanwhile, mayoral candidate William "The King" Stevens'
translation.zh:
‎另外 市长候选人
‎“国王”威廉史蒂文斯的

translation.en: polling numbers have increased…
-There you are, Miss Stanton. -Thank you.
I hear you're not eating.
Nothing tastes right. I'm not… I'm not hungry.
translation.zh: ‎吃什么都味同嚼蜡 我不饿

translation.en: That's expected. But you still need to eat.
translation.zh: ‎这是意料之中的 但你还是得吃

translation.en: Due to your body's changing chemistry,
translation.zh: ‎你身体的化学成分在迅速变化

translation.en: this may be the only thing you can stomach.
translation.zh: ‎因此这可能是你唯一能吃的东西

translation.en: Why raw chicken? That's so gross.
Your body needs pure uncooked amino acids
translation.zh: ‎你的身体需要未经烹煮的纯氨基酸

translation.en: and your skeleton needs phosphorus for density.
translation.zh: ‎你的骨骼需要更多磷 才能结实

translation.en: You can really taste the phosphorus.
It's really good.
God, I'm a monster.
No, you're not.
That's juicy.
I have some work to do.
I'm gonna be sick.
-Don't judge me, it's so good. -Oh my god.
translation.zh:
‎-别鄙视我 太好吃了
‎-天呐

translation.en: My body needs it.
I'm not an animal!
[Emily] Alright. This shot put is around 170 pounds.
translation.zh: ‎（训练 第14天） ‎这只铅球大约77公斤重

translation.en: The average weight of an adult male.
translation.zh: ‎相当于一个成年男性的体重

translation.en: Oh, not the kind of beef I date. I like 'em thick.
translation.zh:
‎和我约会的那些大块头可不是这么轻
‎我喜欢壮的

translation.en: -Here you go. -I'm just kidding.
Here we go.
Do you own that part of the building too?
translation.zh: ‎那部分大楼也是你的产业吗？

translation.en: The sign with my name on it? Yeah.
Could have been Bill Stanton's building. It's a common name.
translation.zh:
‎也可能是比尔斯坦顿大厦啊
‎这名字很常见

translation.en: Hey, wait up.
Ooh, I am unloading all over this guy.
God, he's unloading on me. Wait. He's building all around me.
translation.zh:
‎天呐 他要把我打成筛子了 等等
‎我被他的火力包围了

translation.en: -You are not good at this game. -Can I ask you something?

‎-这游戏你真不擅长
‎-我能不能问问你？

translation.en: If you're never in school, then how do you meet dudes, or chicks,
translation.zh: ‎你从来不上学 怎么去认识男生呢？

translation.en: or, you know, non-specific gender.
translation.zh: ‎或者女生 或者不确定性向者

translation.en: -Everybody's great. Whatever you're into. -I like boys.
translation.zh:
‎-都很好 不管你喜欢什么类型的
‎-我喜欢男生

translation.en: Me, too. You dating anybody interesting?
translation.zh: ‎我也是 在和什么有趣的人约会吗？

translation.en: By interesting, I mean, hot.
Okay. No, but thanks for asking me about it.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 没有 但谢谢你问我

translation.en: My mom doesn't…
I don't know. We just don't talk about that kind of stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我也不知道 我们不谈这种事

translation.en: Go easy on your mom. She's great. She's got a lot of responsibility.

‎别太苛责你妈妈 她很棒的
‎她肩负那么多责任

translation.en: -[grunts] -Why are you still awake?
[Emily] It's one o'clock in the morning, Lydia.
translation.zh: ‎莉迪亚 现在凌晨一点了

translation.en: Tracy, you can't be goofing off like this. We have a job to do.

‎特蕾西 你不能这样游手好闲
‎我们还有工作

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mom.
Go easy on her. It's my fault.
Good night, Lydia.
Good night.
She's always got her panties in a wad. "It's one o'clock in the morning, Lydia."
translation.zh:
‎她总是这么气咻咻的
‎“莉迪亚 现在凌晨一点了“

translation.en: -You didn't sign off. -[splutters]
-You didn't sign off. -[tablet chimes]
Looks like it's just us…
my little raw friend.
-Oh my god, we can still see you. -Ew!
translation.zh: ‎天呐 我们还能看见你呢

translation.en: No, you can't.
For the love of god, hit the off button.
translation.zh: ‎看在上帝份上 按一下关机键

translation.en: I'm sorry. This bird is just so good.
It's so good.
Oh my god, I've created a raw chicken monster.
translation.zh: ‎上帝啊 我创造了一个吃生鸡的怪兽

translation.en: [kisses] Mwah! It's delicious.
My compliments to whoever didn't cook it.

translation.en: Can't unsee that.
Oh man. Tony, I'm sorry. That's on me.
Alright, let's take a water break.

Got it, got it.
You get some water, Tony.
-We've been going at it. -Yeah.
Miss Stanton, it's time for another treatment.

translation.en: -Thank you. -If you can call it that.
Please tell me that at least gives you indigestion or heartburn or something.

‎拜托 告诉我你至少
‎有些消化不良 胃灼热什么的

translation.en: -Are you faking? -Yeah.
You are the worst.
I have been wondering, if it's none of my beeswax you can just tell me,

‎我一直在想 ‎如果这不关我的事 你也可以直说
‎但是…

translation.en: but… where's Tracy's dad?
translation.zh:
‎如果这不关我的事 你也可以直说
‎但是… ‎特蕾西的爸爸在哪儿？

translation.en: Well, I was dating a fellow researcher at Yale.

‎在耶鲁大学时 我和一个
‎一起做研究的同事约会

translation.en: And I suppose the romance involved in the deep dive

‎鲍维里-萨顿染色体学说时

translation.en: into Boveri-Sutton chromosome theory was too much for us to take.

‎由此产生了我们无法承受的后果

translation.en: Oh, sexy science talk.
Well…
when he found out about the baby, he didn't want any part of it.

translation.en: Well, his loss.
Tracy is an awesome kid.
Thanks. She is.

-[bass-heavy rock] -Oh my god, Miscreants! Look out!
-Go, go, go. -[Emily] I told you I was fun.
Alright. You do whatever you gotta do, Tony.

‎（训练 第23天） ‎好吧 你想怎样就怎样吧
‎我看有点夸张

translation.en: Seems like overkill to me.

‎我看有点夸张

translation.en: I'm good.
Man.
Well, I guess the injections are working 'cause I keep hurtin' Tony.

‎我看这些注射起作用了
‎因为我不断让托尼受伤

Oh, thank you, honey.
I keep seeing you taking these pills,
but are we ever going to see some action, or should I say,

‎但我们什么时候
‎能看见你小试身手呢？或者说

‎“什么时候
‎我们能看不见你小试身手呢？”

Are you kidding? I've had, like, thirty-five billion injections in my face

‎开玩笑吗？

Do you feel any different? Are they working?

translation.en: Well, let's see.
Oh, Em, say something, you're freaking me out.

Em, say something. Oh!
You know what? Respect me.
-[Lydia] Uh-uh. -[Tracy] Wait, Lydia. Come back.
Welcome to the carnival, bitch!
Oh!
I am all powerful!
Hit it high! There you go!
Bill!

Hello, Chicago!
Hey, Tony, I swear I'm not gunning for you, man.

‎我发誓 我不是对着你发炮的

-Can I take this off? -You haven't needed that for weeks.

translation.en: Shady.
I got you something.
If you're done training, I can show you the new suits.

Oh, I've been decorating for ya.

That makes zero sense.
It's a catchphrase and a name all in one neat, little package.

[scoffs] That just… I don't know. It just reminds me of the dog Bingo.

I mean, are you thinking "Zorro"?
♪ Zorro was his name-o ♪
-That's not correct. -We gotta think of a team name.

‎-不对
‎-我们得想一个团队名号

translation.en: get our brain juices going again.
See, I can talk science, too. Let's go grab a snack.

‎我们去吃点零食吧

translation.en: Here we go. Crater Joe.
Uh, Flapjack Crackers. Thunder Force.
Mango flops. Did I just do it? Yeah.

translation.en: -Mango Flops? -What? No. Thunder Force.

‎-芒果拖鞋？
‎-什么？不 雷霆女神

translation.en: That sounds kind of dude-ish.
Everything sounds stupid the first time you hear it.

translation.en: Also, you can't say it like… [mumbles] "Thunder Force."

translation.en: I didn't say "Thunder Force."

‎你要理直气壮 声如洪钟地说

translation.en: -Thunder Force! -Right. Thunder Force.
Thunder Force!
See? Try it.
[loudly] Thunder Force!
You don't say… [mumbles] "1985, the Chicago Bears."

translation.zh:
‎你说：“1985年
‎芝加哥熊队赢得超级碗

translation.zh: ‎还创造了史上最牛的专辑和单曲

translation.en: -which was The Super Bowl Shuffle." -"The Chicago Bears."
translation.zh:
‎-那就是《超级碗舞步》
‎-“芝加哥熊队”

translation.en: William "The Fridge" Perry.
I loved him.
Jim McMahon had eye issues and he wore glasses.

translation.en: He would take off the sunglasses, there would be magic.
translation.zh: ‎他会摘下墨镜 就会有魔力

translation.en: ♪ We're not here To cause real trouble ♪
♪ We're here to do The Super Bowl Shuffle ♪
Ah! We're getting off-topic. Can you just say "Thunder Force"?
translation.zh:
‎我们跑题了 你能不能大声说
‎“雷霆女神”？

translation.en: -Thunder Force. -Thunder Force!
Allie wants us in the garage.
Holy shit.
Language.
-Can I say something? -Absolutely not.
This car makes me ovulate.
I wanna have shiny, purple Lamborghini babies.
translation.zh: ‎我想生几个锃亮的紫色兰博基尼宝宝

translation.en: I knew I didn't wanna hear it.
translation.zh: ‎我就知道狗嘴里吐不出象牙

translation.en: Right, get in. We don't have much time.
translation.zh: ‎上车吧 我们时间不多了

translation.en: -For what? -For your first mission.
Shotgun!
-[Emily] That's not what shotgun means. -Oh my god.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道什么叫副驾吗？
‎-上帝啊

translation.en: It's so cool, I can't even get the door open.
translation.zh: ‎太酷了 我连门都打不开

translation.en: -No. I'll open it for you. -[car beeps]
The push-start key is in your suit.
Oh boy. That's…
[Emily] Haven't really driven this one.
[Lydia] How can you have it and not drive it?
translation.zh: ‎你的车 你怎么会没开过？

translation.en: Are they getting in that slowly on purpose?
translation.zh: ‎她们故意那么慢吞吞地上车吗？

translation.en: -Oh boy. That's intimidating. -Yeah.
Maybe squeeze. Squeeze together.
[Lydia] We look awesome?
Oh my god.
Thunder Force!
You look good.
-[tires screech] -[Allie] Well, Thunder Force…
-Good name. -It's a kickass name.
translation.zh:
‎-这名字不错
‎-是个极品的名字

translation.en: For the last six months,
the South Side has been rampaged by a Miscreant named The Crab,
translation.zh: ‎南城一直遭受恶徒“螃蟹”的荼毒

translation.en: who, with his crew, has been robbing stores almost daily.
translation.zh: ‎他和他的同伙几乎每天抢劫店铺

translation.en: Tonight, they're hitting a liquor store on Clark Street.
translation.zh:
‎今天晚上 他们要抢克拉克街的
‎一家卖酒商店

translation.en: The Crab? What's his power?
Like, tasting delicious with melted butter?
Alright, Thunder Force.
-It's time to do what you were made to do. -Wow.
translation.zh: ‎你们就是为了这一刻而生的

translation.en: -My heart's really racing. -Oh boy.
Now that we're going into a possible physical altercation, I'm…
translation.zh: ‎我们可能真的要去和人打架了…

translation.en: feeling my stress rising.
-Mom, open the glove compartment. -Why?
translation.zh:
‎-妈妈 请打开手套箱
‎-为什么？

translation.en: I wanted you to be safe out there. I developed a high-powered taser for you.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你在外面平安无事 ‎所以我为你制造了一把高能电击枪

translation.en: [Lydia] Oh, taters.
That looks awesome!
Due to the electrical charge it imparts, you'll become visible when you use it.
translation.zh: ‎使用时会产生强大电流 ‎所以我认为你用的时候会显形

translation.en: Good to know. It looks powerful.
translation.zh: ‎很重要的信息 看起来很厉害啊

translation.en: What setting should I use?
Maybe five or six?
I'd turn it all the way up.
You don't want to kinda tase somebody
and then they conk you in the melon or something.
-Sounds right to me. -[taser whirs]
-Oh. -Look at us.
Thunder Force.
We did, Em. We're… we're a super team.
translation.zh: ‎我们成功了 我们是超级英雄组合

translation.en: Just like we used to talk about when we were kids.
translation.zh:
‎就像我们小时候
‎坐在秋千上畅想的一样

translation.en: Yeah.
Let's go kick some Miscreant butt.
-We need pump-up music. -Oh, yeah.
Let's get pumped with awesome pump-up music.

translation.en: Let's get pumped!
Is this… Glenn Frey?
In my life, every day is Frey-day.
"Smuggler's Blues." It kicks butt and it's getting us pumped.
translation.zh:
‎《走私者的布鲁斯》
‎很牛 而且让我们热血沸腾

translation.en: Is it?
It was number one on the charts for 11 weeks, Lydia.

‎莉迪亚 这首歌连续11周
‎占据排行榜榜首呢

translation.en: I'm not saying I don't love Glenn Frey. I love Frey.

‎我没说我不喜欢格林弗莱
‎我喜欢弗莱

translation.en: But… there's a time and a place for Frey.
translation.zh: ‎但听弗莱的歌也要分场合分时候

translation.en: Mom, please don't sing into your taser.
