translation.en: You could let Lydia sing into it.
This is it. Pull over.
-I'm gonna barf. -You gotta learn to ride the lightning.
translation.zh:
‎-天呐 我要吐了
‎-你得学会如何风驰电掣

translation.en: Be careful, Mom.
You know I will.
-Let's do this. -It's go time.
-We've gotta rethink this car. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我们得重新考虑一下座驾的问题
‎-对

translation.en: Thunder Force, earpieces in. Do you copy?
translation.zh: ‎雷霆女神 耳机接通了 能听到吗？

translation.en: I copy.
Let's go in the back. Time to go incognito, Bingo.
translation.zh:
‎-我们从后门进去
‎-宾果 隐身吧

translation.en: -That's not my name. -I dunno how you don't love that name.
translation.zh: ‎我不叫宾果 ‎我不明白你为什么不喜欢这个名字

translation.en: -Are you still here? -[Emily] Yes.
Go ahead.
-I was behind-- -You were in front!
translation.zh:
‎-我在你后面
‎-我以为你在我前面呢！

translation.en: [man] Hurry up, go.
Everyone just stay calm and no one's gonna get hurt.
translation.zh: ‎大家保持镇静 就不会有人受伤

translation.en: Hey, big time. Don't hit that button. It's super loud.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 大个子 别按那按钮 很吵的

translation.en: It's the fifth time this year. Rob someone else.
translation.zh: ‎今年都第五次了 抢抢别人行吗？

translation.en: Oh, I'd love less whining.
We're gonna rob everyone. Put money in the bag.
translation.zh: ‎今晚我们挨家挨户地抢 把钱装袋里

translation.en: [Lydia] Hold it, Calamari.
-This robbery's being stopped by Thunder-- -[gunshots]
translation.zh: ‎抢劫到此为止 我们是雷霆…

translation.en: Mom?
-Em, are you okay? -I'm okay.
translation.zh:
‎-艾米莉 你没事吧
‎-我没事

translation.en: No, he's headed right toward us.
translation.zh: ‎不好 他冲我们走过来了

translation.en: Who said that?
Em?
-I'm good. -Let's go kick bad guy butt.
Oh my god! Here we go.
[Allie] Hammer, it is time to go on the offensive.
-I know what I'm gonna do. -[Emily] What're you doing?
translation.zh:
‎-我知道我要做什么
‎-你干什么？

translation.en: -I'm gonna kangaroo his ass. -I don't think that's a good idea.
translation.zh:
‎-我给他来个袋鼠大跳
‎-我觉得不是好主意

translation.en: I know. It's a great idea.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 这是个绝妙的主意

translation.en: Crab, we got a situation here.
Handle it, Kenny.
G'day, mate. [grunts]
Went better than I thought.
Little mule likes to kick.
Hi there, take it easy.
What, uh, what are you?
Well, I'm a Gemini.
What the hell are you?
You'd think Cancer but Capricorn actually, Sag moon.
translation.zh:
‎你会以为我是巨蟹座 其实我是摩羯
‎洋苏草之月

translation.en: And all kinds of things… rising.
-Well, let's hope so. -Lydia!
-Pretty sweet jump. -[Emily] What are you doing?
-I have strong thighs. -[Emily] Stop bragging about your thighs!
translation.zh:
‎-我的大腿格外强健有力
‎-别夸耀你的大腿了！

translation.en: Does take a certain woman to look good dropping through acoustic tile.
translation.zh:
‎砸穿天花板掉下来 还这么美丽动人
‎你不是一般的女子

translation.en: [Emily] Lydia!
[Emily] Lydia! Hey!
[Emily] Hey! Lydia!
[Emily] What are you doing?
-Ow! -I got her, boss.
[Emily] You're about to be Thunder Forced.
Em, stop!
It's not me. The taser is locked in a high voltage loop.
translation.zh:
‎不是我
‎电击枪锁定在高压循环模式了

translation.en: I can't get it off his face!
I was trying to tell you, don't use a high setting!
translation.zh: ‎我一直想告诉你 别设定高档位！

translation.en: -You're cooking him from inside. -Man!
translation.zh:
‎-你要把他从里到外烤熟了
‎-啊！

translation.en: Please don't film this, sir. This is a mistake!
translation.zh: ‎先生 请不要拍摄 这是个错误！

translation.en: -Why are you still tasing me? -It's a mistake!
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么电起我来没完没了？
‎-这是个错误！

translation.en: I'm sorry.
-"Sorry"? He was trying to kill me. -[The Crab] He's a murderer and felon.
translation.zh:
‎-“对不起”？他要打死我
‎-他是杀人犯 犯有重罪

translation.en: He deserves better.
It's been a blast but we're gonna hit it. Get your shit together.
translation.zh:
‎我们玩得很尽兴 但我们要走了
‎兄弟们 撤

translation.en: -Wait a minute. Nobo-- -Nobody move. Nobody move.
[The Crab] What's gonna happen? You guys stopped the heist.
translation.zh: ‎你们还要怎样？你们阻止了一次抢劫

translation.en: You cooked the dude. You're gonna kill us?
translation.zh: ‎把那家伙烤熟了 还要打死我们吗？

translation.en: That'd make you as bad as a crab-man. Come on, let's go.
translation.zh:
‎那样的话
‎你们也不比我螃蟹好到哪去 我们走

translation.en: You're an embarrassment, you know that?
translation.zh: ‎你们真是丢人现眼 知道吗？

translation.en: [clerk] Wait, wait, wait. Are you Miscreants?
No, we're Thunder Force.
Damn right we are.
We did it!
What's Thunder Force?
They don't… they don't-- Do the thing.
[both] We're Thunder Force.
[Lydia] See? Is it still not…
It's out of context. It's probably still confu-- We're the good guys.
translation.zh: ‎缺乏语境 ‎好像还是不…我们是好人

translation.en: We're not doing it for thanks. We protect the city.
translation.zh:
‎我们不求你们感恩戴德
‎我们只求城市平安

translation.en: If you wanna thank me with a pickle in a bag--
translation.zh:
‎但如果
‎你想给我一袋酸黄瓜表示感谢…

translation.en: Hey, you saved our lives.
You deserve a pickle bag.
Okay, so we're out,
and just know, this is gonna to be in here before we hit the Lambo.
translation.zh:
‎不等我们回到兰博基尼车上
‎这条黄瓜就会进我嘴里

translation.en: Sorry about that.
-Remember, Thunder Force. -Thunder Force saving the city, y'all.
translation.zh:
‎-记住 雷霆女神
‎-雷霆女神拯救城市

translation.en: For the first time in history,
actual superheroes are fighting back against the Miscreant menace.
translation.zh:
‎真正的超级英雄出现了
‎她们开始反击恶徒

translation.en: They call themselves "Thunder Force" and after a rocky start with a taser,
translation.zh:
‎她们自称“雷霆女神”
‎第一次动用电击枪时不怎么顺利

translation.en: they've been fighting crime on a regular basis in our city
translation.zh: ‎但自那以后 她们频频现身 打击犯罪

translation.en: and getting real results.
"These are the two morons that ripped off the jewelry store on Grant Street.
translation.zh:
‎“就是这两个傻瓜
‎抢了格兰特街的珠宝店”

translation.en: We don't want any reward,
but would like to throw out the first pitch at a Cubs game.
translation.zh:
‎但希望能在小熊队比赛时
‎扔出第一记投球”

translation.en: Sincerely, Thunder Force."
How could you not love Thunder Force?
And it seems that Chicago's new super-team knows how to have fun.
translation.zh:
‎而且 貌似芝加哥新登场的超级组合
‎还很会玩

translation.en: The question is, "Is Thunder Force a match for Laser?"
translation.zh:
‎问题是：
‎“雷霆女神斗得过激光女吗？”

translation.en: In other news, Rachel Gonzales has narrowed the gap
translation.zh:
‎其他新闻：
‎瑞秋冈萨雷斯在民调中缩小了

translation.en: with The King in the polls.
Her progressive platform and campaign have given Gonzales a bump among voters.
translation.zh: ‎进步的竞选纲领和草根战略 ‎让冈萨雷斯赢得了更多选民的青睐

translation.en: Who are these two?
Where'd they get their powers?
If there are superheroes now, what do people need me for?
translation.zh: ‎有了超级英雄 人们还要我干什么？

translation.en: Tough to know.
-The whole point is I'm scaring people. -Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-全部重点就在于 我让人民恐惧
‎-当然

translation.en: Manipulating the media into believing that you're a problem only I can solve.
translation.zh:
‎让媒体相信 你们是个问题
‎只有我能解决

translation.en: That's how I win this stupid election.
translation.zh: ‎这样我才能赢这个该死的竞选

translation.en: How can we not stop two chicks in their forties?
translation.zh:
‎我们为什么
‎连两个40岁出头的女人都打不过？

translation.en: -Mid-forties at least. -At least.
Here you go, sir.
There he is. Looking better.
-You look like balls. -Sorry. I'll get some cream or something.
translation.zh:
‎-你的脑袋像驴蛋
‎-对不起 我去拿些奶油

translation.en: A lot of it. Get a lot.
Not to sound like a femme fatale, but it feels like I need to kill them.
translation.zh:
‎我并不想扮演美女蛇的角色
‎但我似乎需要干掉她们

translation.en: Toss her a treat.
I like her.
-What? -I like you, Laser.
But here's what I think.
If I let you kill them now, I get heat because it looks like I couldn't stop you.
translation.zh:
‎如果我现在让你干掉她们 ‎我就会承受压力
‎因为人们会认为我无力阻止你

translation.en: So, I say we have a talk with them.
translation.zh: ‎所以 我认为我们应该和她们谈判

translation.en: And if the talk goes right, it goes right, but if it goes wrong…
translation.zh:
‎如果谈判成功 当然很好
‎如果不成功…

translation.en: I kill them.
Yeah, I was gonna…
I'm not so sure they're gonna be so easy to kill, boss.
translation.zh: ‎老板 我担心她们不那么容易被干掉

translation.en: -Come here. -No, thank you. I'm okay.
translation.zh:
‎-过来
‎-不 谢谢 不必了

translation.en: No. Come, come, come.
Come on. Come on. Come here.
Come on.
Clean that up.
[Lydia] Look at this. This is awesome. We have our own logo.
translation.zh: ‎看呐 太棒了 我们有了自己的标志

translation.en: -[Tracy] I designed it. -Honey, we're legit now.
translation.zh:
‎-我设计的
‎-亲爱的 我们是正规军了

translation.en: You know what? If we've got a logo this cool, we are ready for a theme song.
translation.zh:
‎你猜怎么？我们有了这么酷的标志
‎还需要一首主题歌

translation.en: Like an anthem. Like David Lee Roth, Jon Bon Jovi.
translation.zh:
‎一首招牌金曲
‎比如大卫李罗斯、邦乔飞乐队

translation.en: They come down, lay down some lyrics.
I'll play guitar. Right after I learn how to play guitar.
translation.zh: ‎我弹吉他 当然我要先学会弹吉他

translation.en: Uh, do you remember the high school talent show?
Girl, why--
Get behind me.
There's a handle, you know.
Oops, couldn't find it.
Stand down.
This is a social visit. Otherwise, you'd already be, you know, dead.
translation.zh:
‎这是一次友好访问
‎不然 你们早已死了

translation.en: You two are working together? Of course.
It's all been a setup.
I bet The Crab works for you too, huh. Are you rounding up all the Miscreants?
translation.zh:
‎我打赌 螃蟹也是你的手下吧？
‎所有恶徒都成你的走狗了？

translation.en: Look at that. You really are smart.
Sweet. Yeah, I'm kind of unionizing them.
translation.zh: ‎好极了 是的 我把他们组织起来了

translation.en: Someday, all Miscreants will work for me.
translation.zh: ‎有朝一日 所有恶徒都会为我所用

translation.en: Tracy, will you let Allie know we have guests?
translation.zh: ‎特蕾西 你去告诉艾丽 来客人了

translation.en: Okay.
Was Allie the, uh, the bossy girl with all the rules?
translation.zh:
‎艾丽是那个爱发号施令的姑娘吗？
‎规矩特别多的那个？

translation.en: Hey, she's unconscious in the hallway.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 她在走廊里昏过去了

translation.en: Knocked her out when we fried security.
translation.zh:
‎我们破坏安防系统的时候
‎把她打晕了

translation.en: Anyway, you're changing the narrative of the election, and I can't have that,
translation.zh: ‎你们改变了竞选的叙事 我不能容忍

translation.en: so I could always use a couple of Miscreants or superheroes
translation.zh:
‎所以 如果再来两个恶徒或超级英雄
‎为我服务 我总是很欢迎的

translation.en: or whatever it is you two are.
I could definitely use your muscle as I expand operations here.
translation.zh:
‎我扩张势力的时候
‎绝对用得上你们的力量

translation.en: And I could probably use whatever it is that you do, too.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道你会什么
‎也许也能派得上用场

translation.en: -I think. -What if we just say no?
What if I pick you two up and smack ya together like castanets, huh?
translation.zh:
‎如果我把你们俩抓过来
‎像打响板一样对着敲呢？

translation.en: Maybe we start telling people what's going on.
translation.zh: ‎也许我们会告诉人们事情的真相

translation.en: I'm gonna win this election and become mayor,
translation.zh: ‎我会赢得竞选 成为市长

translation.en: and then I'm gonna win other elections until I'm president,
translation.zh:
‎今后我还会赢更多竞选
‎直到我当上总统

translation.en: -and then I'll be pulling all the strings. -Huh.
translation.zh: ‎那时 我就有了掌控一切的力量

translation.en: You've got family here in town, don't you, Bongo?
translation.zh: ‎邦果 你在本地还有亲人 是不是？

translation.en: It's Bingo.
I don't care.
-I don't know why I'm defending that name. -Not now.
translation.zh:
‎-我为什么要纠正他 我讨厌这个名字
‎-现在不是时候

translation.en: Come on, lady-girls.
What side of history you wanna be on?
I'm not scared of you.
-Can't wait to kill you both. -Oh--
translation.zh: ‎我迫不及待想把你们俩都干掉

translation.en: -What? -I wasn't done.
-I'm right here. -Sure, okay.
Can't wait to kill you both.
translation.zh: ‎我迫不及待想把你们俩都干掉

translation.en: -All that for the same line-- -Can't wait to kill you both.
translation.zh:
‎-一句台词重复两遍…
‎-我迫不及待想把你们俩都干掉

translation.en: Especially you, Bingo.
You just-- You gotta work on your act a little bit. There we go.
translation.zh:
‎你们…你们需要好好排演一下
‎哦 她走了

translation.en: She always walk that slow?
That's gotta drive you nuts, right?
Bye. Thanks for coming.
-Don't antagonize them. -I get nervous.
translation.zh:
‎-不要刺激他们
‎-对不起 我太紧张了

translation.en: [Laser] Here, to the right.
-We gotta go check on Grandma. -Okay. Let's go.
[Grandma] Lydia, would you say grace, please?
translation.zh: ‎莉迪亚 你来念祈祷词好吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Dear God, bless this food and the hands that prepared it.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的上帝 请你祝福这食物
‎和备办这些食物的双手

translation.en: Uh, you know, thanks for being super cool and stuff.
So, keep kicking butt and, uh, peace out.
Amen.
-Amen. -Amen.
have you, um, given any more thought
translation.zh:
‎外婆 我可以帮您
‎搬到一个更安全的街区

translation.en: to letting me get you a place in a safer neighborhood?
Why would I?
This has been my home for a long time, and it'll do me until the end.
translation.zh:
‎这里一直是我家
‎我会住在这里直到终老

translation.en: Please don't talk like that.
I dig it, Grandma. Morality, right?
translation.zh: ‎我理解 外婆 谁能化羽成仙？

translation.en: It's mortality.
It's what?
-Mortality. -That's what I said.
You said morality.
-I'm-- What are you saying? -Mortality.
You're just putting extra Ts in it, Morta-ta-ta-tality.
translation.zh: ‎“羽化” “化羽” 正说反说都一样

translation.en: I am so happy to see you girls getting along again. So nice.
translation.zh:
‎你们两个又和好如初了 真好
‎我真高兴

translation.en: -And where is my great-granddaughter? -She's at work.
She's a hard worker just like her mom.
translation.zh: ‎她这么勤劳 跟她妈妈一样

translation.en: Can you keep a secret?
-You better not keep secrets from me. -We shouldn't tell her.
translation.zh:
‎-有什么秘密可别瞒着我
‎-我们不应该告诉她

translation.en: Why not? We should probably tell somebody. She probably knows.
translation.zh:
‎为什么？我们也许应该告诉某个人
‎她可能已经知道了呢

translation.en: -Lydia-- -We're--
Oh, this is amazing.
Oh, please let it be true.
-I have been praying for this day. -Praying for what?
translation.zh:
‎-我一直盼着这一天呢
‎-盼着什么？

translation.en: -Really? -[Grandma] For this moment.
For you two to tell me that you're a couple.
I always knew you were right for each other.
translation.zh: ‎我就知道你们俩在一起最合适了

translation.en: [Lydia] Yeah, um…
Wow, that's… I have been saving it for this very moment.
translation.zh:
‎-这真是…
‎-这东西我一直留着 就是为了这一刻

translation.en: -I've got Michelle Obama arms. -You really do. Your arms look amazing.
translation.zh: ‎我的胳膊像米切尔奥巴马 ‎的确 你的胳膊非常好看 哪个是我？

translation.en: Which one am I?
translation.zh: ‎的确 你的胳膊非常好看 哪个是我？

translation.en: Okay, you know… Uh, wow, that's a… that's a lot to unpack.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你知道…我有点凌乱

translation.en: [Lydia] You know, I think we both prefer…
you know, dudes.
-You don't have to look so disappointed. -I can't help it.
translation.zh:
‎-您也没必要这么失望啊
‎-我情不自禁

translation.en: You could at least try.
What? Now? You gotta woo me.
I thought that was it.
But if the secret is you're Thunder Force,
translation.zh:
‎但如果你说的秘密
‎就是你们是雷霆女神

translation.en: you must think I don't watch the news. You're a meme now.
translation.zh:
‎那你们一定以为我从不看新闻
‎你们已经成为表情包了

translation.en: Well…
uh, Grandma that's kind of why we're here.
translation.zh: ‎外婆 我们就是为这事来的

translation.en: You could be in danger.
At least move into our building.
-Even if it's just temporarily. -I'm not going anywhere.
translation.zh:
‎-哪怕只是暂时的
‎-我哪儿也不去

translation.en: Those people out there killed my daughter,
took your parents from you, ruined this city.
translation.zh: ‎让你失去了父母 破坏了这个城市

translation.en: Now I want you two strong women
to go out there,
kick butt like the superheroes you are, and you don't stop until the job is done.
translation.zh:
‎作为超级英雄 和他们战斗
‎不打败他们绝不罢休

translation.en: -Okay. -And only on that day
when the city is free from Miscreants,
can you two have a wedding.
-Come on, eat. It's getting cold. -[overlapping chatter, laughter]
Hello, Chicago, thank you for being here.
translation.zh: ‎你好 芝加哥 感谢大家光临

translation.en: I won't take up too much of your time.
I just want you to know…
-No sign of Laser. -[Tracy] Keep your eyes open.
This suit is getting ripe. I gotta wash it.
translation.zh: ‎衣服都有味儿了 我得洗洗

translation.en: -You can't wash it. -Are you kidding?
How am I supposed to keep it fresh?
-I need to work on that. -Yeah, you do.
Quickly.
…for the rights and safety of every last one of you.
[all chanting] Rachel!
Let's give it up for our new super-team who's out protecting our city every night.
translation.zh:
‎掌声献给每个夜晚守护我们城市的
‎新的超级组合

translation.en: Thunder Force!
How's it going, Chicago?
translation.zh: ‎芝加哥公民们 大家好吗？

translation.en: Exciting news, Thunder Force is available for selfies for the low price of $100.
translation.zh:
‎好消息 雷霆女神可以和大家
‎合影留念 只需100美元

translation.en: "What? That seems so cheap." "It sure does."
Um, we do not take selfies, and if we did, they'd be free.
translation.zh:
‎我们不能合影
‎如果可以的话 也会是免费的

translation.en: And they are free.
They're free with a $100 donation.
translation.zh: ‎捐献100美元 即可免费合影

translation.en: -[crowd chanting] Thunder Force! -[Lydia] Stop!
Stop, stop, you guys, stop!
We can't take it. Now how do we roll, Chicago?
translation.zh: ‎我们受不了 芝加哥 我们怎么样？

translation.en: -[crowd] Like thunder! -How do we roll?
Like thunder!
-[Lydia] How do we roll? How do we roll? -[crowd chanting] Like thunder!
translation.zh:
‎-我们怎么样？
‎-像雷霆一样！ ‎-我们怎么样？
‎-像雷霆一样！

translation.en: [reporter] One thing we've been covering, early exit polling.
translation.zh:
‎今天下午 我们一直在关注
‎初步的出口民调

translation.en: We are watching the minute-by-minute examples
that are coming into us here at the station.
Leading up to the breaking news, we will have…
translation.zh: ‎直到实时结果出炉 我们会…

translation.en: Maybe we should just turn that off.
[Kenny] I think so.
Hey, chief, you got concealer on? Is that what that is?
translation.zh: ‎你涂遮瑕霜了吗？那是遮瑕霜吗？

translation.en: Well, yeah. I moisturized it and tried to touch it up a bit.
translation.zh: ‎对 我用了点保湿水 也稍微遮盖一下

translation.en: -Is it helping? -Not really.
Go make a snack. He doesn't need to look at this.
translation.zh:
‎去给自己找点零食吃吧
‎别让他看见你这样

translation.en: -I'm not hungry. -Preferably something with aloe.
-Okay. -Find an aloe plant and chew on that.
-[clears throat] -Hi!
Never not funny.
So, how am I doing?
With the, uh…
I don't know. I'm not watching. You shouldn't watch either.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 我没看 你也不应该看

translation.en: Maybe just go make a pot of that and enjoy.
translation.zh: ‎也许你应该煮一壶咖啡 享受一下

translation.en: [reporter 2] …protecting our city, Thunder Force!
translation.zh: ‎…每晚保卫着我们的城市 雷霆女神！

translation.en: Thunder Force's recent endorsement of Rachel Gonzales
translation.zh:
‎最近 雷霆女神公开支持
‎瑞秋冈萨雷斯

translation.en: gave her a bump at the polls.
-Andrew. -Yeah.
-Does this side look the same as this? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-我这边和这边看着一样吗？
‎-不一样

translation.en: Can you tell which? One side has a small scab.
translation.zh:
‎能看出来哪边不一样吗？
‎一边有一小块结痂

translation.en: -No, a large scab. -Shit.
[reporter 2] We have breaking news. We are ready to call the election.
translation.zh:
‎最新结果出来了
‎我们要宣布选举结果了

translation.en: Rachel Gonzales will be the next mayor of Chicago.
translation.zh:
‎瑞秋冈萨雷斯
‎将成为下一任芝加哥市长

translation.en: -And this is a major-- -The King doesn't lose!
-[reporter 1] …The King's full reaction. -God damn it, sir.
That was Kenny. Good member of the team.
translation.zh: ‎是肯尼 他是个很好的团队成员

translation.en: He shouldn't have been there.
Your eyes are doing the weird thing. Can we get you drops?
translation.zh:
‎你的眼睛又有点奇怪了
‎要不要我们给你找些眼药水？

translation.en: I'm fine. Don't worry about me.
That Thunder Force, they're everywhere.
Someone needs to kill 'em. They have to be dead.
translation.zh: ‎需要有人干掉她们 她们必须死

translation.en: Will you stop doing that, please?
translation.zh: ‎你们别一个劲儿地后退好吗？

translation.en: I'm not some little kid throwing a tantrum!
translation.zh: ‎我不是一个发脾气的小屁孩

translation.en: I'm very frustrated.
And even though I killed that guy before,
translation.zh: ‎而且 尽管我刚才杀死了那个家伙

translation.en: it was kind of an accident, so…
kill that guy.
How do you feel now?
Yeah, better. But not great. But better.
translation.zh: ‎好多了 不是很好 但好多了

translation.en: You know, boss, I, uh… I validate your feelings.
translation.zh: ‎老板 你的感受是合理的

translation.en: Your feelings are your feelings, but tactically speaking
translation.zh:
‎那就是你的真实感受
‎但是从战术的角度来说

translation.en: I don't think it's smart to be killing off our best crew members.
translation.zh:
‎我认为 干掉我们最好的团队成员
‎是不明智的

translation.en: -Was that Walter she just zapped? -Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎那是沃特吗？她刚射死的是沃特吗？

translation.en: -Walter was even better than Kenny. -Crap, I didn't know--
translation.zh:
‎-沃特比肯尼更优秀
‎-该死 我不知道…

translation.en: -I liked Walter. -Yeah.
What's his name?
The one left standing? That's Andy. Andy, can you say hi?
translation.zh:
‎站在旁边的那个？
‎他是安迪 安迪 打个招呼

translation.en: -It's actually Andrew, but Andy's fine. -Just the hi.
translation.zh:
‎-其实是安德鲁 但安迪也行
‎-打个招呼

translation.en: Hi.
I don't like that guy.
Next time, kill And-- What do you prefer? Andrew? Andy?
translation.zh:
‎下次杀死安…你喜欢人们叫你什么？
‎安德鲁？安迪？

translation.en: Either one. At work it's more professional to go by Andrew.
translation.zh: ‎都行 在工作场合 叫安德鲁更正式些

translation.en: My mom calls me Andy.
Andy-Pandy, but seems too familiar as I say it out loud.
translation.zh: ‎安迪-潘迪 但这么叫听起来太亲近了

translation.en: Lacrosse had three Andrews. They called me Drew.
translation.zh:
‎我的棍网球队里有三个安德鲁
‎他们叫我德鲁

translation.en: My coach called me by my middle name, Andy. Alright.
translation.zh:
‎-我的教练叫我的中间名 安迪
‎-好了

translation.en: My mom's new boyfriend loves Andrew Lloyd Webber.
translation.zh:
‎我妈妈的新男友
‎喜欢安德鲁洛伊德韦伯

translation.en: -So, he just calls me Paul. -Enough.
translation.zh:
‎-所以 他就叫我保罗
‎-够了

translation.en: Next time kill Andrew.
Got it. What's our next move?
translation.zh: ‎明白 我们下一步怎么办？

translation.en: Well, as I like to say,
when life gives you lemons, make… [both] …lemon-flavored napalm.
translation.zh:
‎当生活给你柠檬
‎你就做柠檬味的凝固汽油弹

translation.en: It's the greatest saying.
-Call a news conference. -Will do.
-Clean that up, Andy-rew. -Yeah.
-Yeah. -Whatever.
[The King] I believe in democracy.
I lost to the better candidate tonight and as a gesture of goodwill,
translation.zh:
‎今晚我输给了一个更好的候选人
‎为了表达我的善意

translation.en: I'm gonna host a celebration for mayor-elect Gonzales
translation.zh:
‎我要为候任市长冈萨雷斯
‎和伟大的芝加哥市

translation.en: and the great city of Chicago.
Because this city deserves what's coming to it.
A party!
Thank you.
[Frank] Pancakes on the house.
Look. Business has picked up thanks to you two.
translation.zh: ‎看呐 多亏你们俩 生意好多了

translation.en: So, thank you, Lydia, Emily.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你 莉迪亚 谢谢你 艾米莉

translation.en: Welcome.
-Those suits are great. -Right?
Wish I had one.
-Alright. Enjoy. -Thanks.
Yeah. How about a toast to the good guys winning the election?
translation.zh: ‎好人赢得了选举 干一杯吧

translation.en: Let's not celebrate too fast.
The King's not throwing a party out of the goodness of his heart.
translation.zh:
‎国王为这个城市举办派对
‎可不是出于好意

translation.en: Yeah.
Excuse me. I'm gonna wash my hands up.
Not washing her hands. She's going to the can.
translation.zh: ‎她不是洗手去了 她是去上厕所

translation.en: God knows what she's doing. I don't wanna know.
translation.zh: ‎天知道她在厕所干什么 我不想知道

translation.en: Sometimes I can't picture certain people doing certain things.
translation.zh: ‎有时我不能设想某些人做某些事

translation.en: Know what I mean? Like Obama vacuuming
translation.zh: ‎你明白我意思吗？比如奥巴马吸地

translation.en: or Eleanor Roosevelt flossing--
translation.zh: ‎或者埃琳娜罗斯福用牙线洁牙…

translation.en: -Em, are you okay? -What happened?
translation.zh:
‎-艾米莉…你没事吧？
‎-出什么事了？

translation.en: Are you okay?
Are you okay?
Frank, stay down.
Stay down.
I thought The King wanted to talk things through.
I've been let off the leash.
You need to work on your phrasing,
translation.zh:
‎你应该好好想想怎么说话
‎照你这么说

translation.en: because in that scenario, you just made yourself the dog.
translation.zh:
‎你应该好好想想怎么说话
‎照你这么说 ‎你成狗了

translation.en: I'm surprised you ding-dongs lived through the first blast.
translation.zh:
‎你们这几个白痴
‎居然逃过了第一次轰炸

translation.en: -You're stronger than I thought. -Maybe you're weaker than you thought.
translation.zh:
‎-你们比我想的更扛打
‎-也许你没有你自己想的那么强

translation.en: I'm…
not…
weak!
Did she call us ding-dongs?
Get a shovel. I'm gonna bury that bitch.
translation.zh: ‎找把铁锹 我要埋了那个贱人

translation.en: -No! We just fixed that door! -Frank, be qui--
translation.zh:
‎-不！我们刚把那门修好！
‎-弗兰克 别说…

translation.en: [Frank] Please, no…
I could hit harder, but I don't wanna kill you,
translation.zh: ‎我可以打得再狠些 但我不想打死你

translation.en: but you will stop hurting my friends!
Bye-bye, nerds.
Wack job.
Stop! Everyone off the bus now!
Stay here, Frank. Lydi!
translation.zh: ‎弗兰克 你别动 莉迪亚！

translation.en: What the hell happened?
Thunder Force needs this.
Lydia, no. Do not throw that bus.
translation.zh: ‎莉迪亚 别 不要扔那辆公交车

translation.en: -Lydia! -I got it!
No, they're too far away! Do not!
translation.zh:
‎不行 他们跑远了！
‎别扔这辆公交车！

translation.en: I can't hear you because I'm literally throwing a bus!
translation.zh:
‎我听不见你说什么
‎因为我要扔一辆公交车！

translation.en: Dads, that lady just threw a bus.
translation.zh:
‎爸爸 那位女士
‎把一辆公交车扔出去了

translation.en: My god, I just threw a bus.
translation.zh: ‎天呐 我扔了一辆公交车

translation.en: Of course, you did. You don't think before you act.
translation.zh: ‎可不是么 你做事之前也不想想

translation.en: You always do the stupid thing.
You could've hurt someone.
You know how dangerous that was?
I'm sorry. I messed up. I was trying to stop her.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 我搞砸了 我是想阻止她

translation.en: Dang it. You always get carried away.
translation.zh: ‎莉迪亚 你总是忘乎所以

translation.en: Ever since we were kids.
You understand this isn't a game? We have a job to do.
translation.zh:
‎这不是做游戏 你不明白吗？
‎我们肩负着使命

translation.en: I have dedicated my life to stopping Miscreants
and here you are acting like one.
I didn't see you trying anything to stop her except disappearing,
translation.zh:
‎我没看见你做任何事去阻止她
‎你只会玩消失

translation.en: which, by the way, you've been doing since before you got your power.
translation.zh: ‎而且我要说 ‎你获得超能力之前 就很会玩消失

translation.en: You know what? I should have both powers because I'd know how to use them.
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗？我应该拥有两种超能力
‎因为我知道如何运用

translation.en: Whatever you say. You're always right.
You're the special one, not me. Right, Em?
translation.zh: ‎你出类拔萃 我是俗人 对吧？

translation.en: Crap doodles!
[reporter] In their attempt to stop Laser,
translation.zh: ‎雷霆女神不但没能阻止激光女

translation.en: Thunder Force destroyed a bus and Buckingham Fountain,
translation.zh: ‎还损毁了一辆公交车和白金汉喷泉

translation.en: raising the question, are we better off with Thunder Force?
translation.zh:
‎人们不禁要问 雷霆女神
‎会让我们的城市更好吗？

translation.en: -[Emily] Trace? -We'll have more as the story--
translation.zh:
‎-特蕾西？
‎-我们会有更多后续报道…

translation.en: [Emily] Hey.
-What are you reading? -Oh.
Molecular Thermodynamics of Complex Systems.
Oh, I love that one.
-Can I read it after you finish? -Sure.
translation.zh:
‎-你看完以后我能再看看吗？
‎-当然

translation.en: Are you okay, Mom?
I'm, uh…
I'm okay, honey.
Just… working through some stuff with Lydia.
translation.zh: ‎只是…和莉迪亚遇到了点问题

translation.en: I know. She called me.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 她给我打电话了

translation.en: Of course, she did.
-You guys get along okay, huh? -I like her.
translation.zh:
‎-你们俩相处得还不错？
‎-我喜欢她

translation.en: She's weird and she's funny and we talk about a lot of stuff.
translation.zh: ‎她怪怪的 又风趣 我们聊很多话题

translation.en: You think I don't talk to you enough?
Am I too tough on you?
I've just… I've always wanted to make it so other people, so you…
translation.zh:
‎我只是…我一直希望能成功
‎这样其他人 包括你…

translation.en: -didn't have to grow up the way I did. -Afraid?
translation.zh:
‎-就不会再有我那样的童年
‎-担惊受怕？

translation.en: Yeah.
I'm so sorry, honey.
[Emily] I miss my mom and dad every day,
but I've been so consumed with righting a wrong that I've…
translation.zh: ‎但我一门心思想要伸张正义 以至于…

translation.en: oh, I've missed out on so much of our time together.
I'm gonna change that.
You do great.
You're too hard on yourself, and Lydia too.
translation.zh: ‎你对自己和莉迪亚都太苛刻了

translation.en: She's been your friend for a long time. Even when you didn't want her to be.
translation.zh:
‎她是你多年的朋友
‎哪怕有时候你不想要这个朋友

translation.en: She's always been a bit of a hurricane.
-She's a good person. -I know she is.
But she threw a bus.
Yeah, but in her defense, she was trying to stop the bad guys, right?
translation.zh:
‎是啊 但她也是为了阻止坏人
‎对不对？

translation.en: -She was. -Also, she really wanted to throw a bus.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-另外 她也是真想扔公交车

translation.en: You're too much.
Oh, I'm so proud of you.
-Did she say where she was going? -On a date.
That's Lydia for you.
Always finding time to have fun.
[The Crab] Swimming is what I try to focus on.
-[Lydia] Is it? -Yeah.
[Lydia] You got the shoulders for it.
I am very surprised that you reached out to me.
Especially since I thought that you might be dead.
translation.zh: ‎特别是我以为你可能已经死了

translation.en: It wasn't for lack of trying, right?
That psycho Laser really put her back into trying to kill us.
translation.zh:
‎那个神经病激光女
‎竭尽全力想弄死我们

translation.en: It was a surprise you made it out alive.
translation.zh: ‎你们居然没死 令人意外

translation.en: Lot of people don't live to tell the tale.
She just-- She loves killing people.
Just loves it. So boring.
I guess I got lucky. I'm built like a Sherman tank.
translation.zh:
‎也许算我走运
‎我壮实得像一台谢尔曼坦克

translation.en: -Mmm. -The suits are very resilient. I mean, they do not smell good.
translation.zh: ‎战衣很抗击打 就是有味儿

translation.en: Wow, they don't smell good. But very resilient.
translation.zh: ‎哎呀 真是有味儿 但很抗击打

translation.en: You smell good to me.
Yeah. Which, you know, is surprising, 'cause I don't have a sense of smell that good,
translation.zh:
‎这很令人吃惊
‎因为自从那次意外之后

translation.en: ever since the, you know-- Since the accident.
If it's not too… too much, too soon, what happened?
translation.zh:
‎如果你不介意我冒昧的话
‎当时是什么情况？

translation.en: Oh, well, I was on my honeymoon in Bermuda,
and my then-wife, she says, "Jer, how about we go skinny-dip snorkeling?"
translation.zh:
‎我当时的妻子说：
‎“杰瑞 我们去裸泳吧？”

translation.en: And, uh, I say, "That sounds fun. Let's go buns up."
translation.zh: ‎我说：“好啊 我们光屁股下水吧”

translation.en: We took off our clothes, jumped in the water,
and what we didn't know is we were over a radioactive coral reef.
translation.zh:
‎我们不知道
‎水下有一片有辐射的珊瑚礁

translation.en: Is that right?
And up jumps a radioactive crab, bites me in the genitals.
translation.zh:
‎一只带辐射的螃蟹跳上来
‎咬了我的要害

translation.en: Oh, man.
Rest is history.
-She immediately left me. -Her loss.
translation.zh:
‎-她立刻离开我了
‎-这是她的损失

translation.en: Anyway, I went into a life of crime.
translation.zh: ‎总之 我开始走上犯罪道路

translation.en: I don't know, it brings up some kinda questions.
translation.zh: ‎我也不知道啦 这引出一些问题

translation.en: You tell me that story. Are you-- I mean, are you fully a Miscreant or…
translation.zh:
‎你对我讲了你的遭遇 那么
‎你是彻头彻尾的恶徒吗？还是…

translation.en: Not crazy about labels.
-But I do get that a lot. -Yeah.
What I usually-- I say I'm a Half-creant.
translation.zh: ‎通常…我会说 我是个半徒

translation.en: -Half-Korean. -Half-creant.
I thought you said half-Korean.
You're not the first one to-- Yeah, but no.
translation.zh: ‎你不是第一个…是啊 但不是

translation.en: Either one would be wildly interesting, but Half-creant… I like that.
translation.zh:
‎斑秃 半徒 都没关系
‎但是“半徒”…我喜欢

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
I thought we had a real nice connection there at the liquor store.
translation.zh:
‎嘿 我觉得 在那个卖酒商店
‎我们好像擦出了些火花呢

translation.en: You know, I don't know if it's…
because I got a lot of family up and down the East Coast or…
translation.zh:
‎因为我的很多亲戚散居在东海岸各地
‎还是…

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
Maybe it's the smell of Old Bay has always kind of…
translation.zh: ‎也许老湾调味料的气息总是那么…

translation.en: just done something to me.
Kind of made me warm and fuzzy.
It's a great smell.
I look at you and I just think somewhere inside those kind of yoked, strong…
translation.zh: ‎我看着你 我想 ‎在那坚硬强壮的…

translation.en: glistening shells,
is the heart of a really good man-crab.
translation.zh: ‎有一颗善良的螃蟹男人的心

translation.en: How about a toast, huh? To me, right?
-To you. -Come here.
-It's-- -Hang on one sec.
-Can I get you a little-- -No, I'm not a child.
translation.zh:
‎-要不要我…
‎-不用 我不是小孩

translation.en: Sometimes I do need to drink it like it's cocoa.
translation.zh: ‎有时候 我得像喝一杯可可那样

translation.en: -Yep. Me too. -They're super powerful. But let's try it.
translation.zh:
‎-对 我也是
‎-它们力气超大 但我们试试

translation.en: Cheers to me, huh?
Son of a bitch! [loudly] God damn it!
Oh, don't be rude. Eat your dinner. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎不要失态 吃你的晚饭吧 谢谢

translation.en: [Lydia] Show's over.
I keep thinking I've got a handle on it.
translation.zh:
‎我总觉得我掌握了窍门
‎我就应该用小酒盅

translation.en: I should stick with shot glasses and things get easier for me.
translation.zh:
‎我总觉得我掌握了窍门
‎我就应该用小酒盅 ‎那样会容易一些 谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thanks for that.
translation.zh: ‎那样会容易一些 谢谢 ‎谢谢

translation.en: You got a… a weak glass there.
Hey, there. Thank you, Carl. We'll clean that right up.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 卡尔 我们来收拾

translation.en: Happens all the time. Any decisions on food?
translation.zh: ‎经常发生 想好点什么了吗？

translation.en: -Well-- -If you're looking for suggestions,
translation.zh: ‎嗯… ‎如果你们需要一点建议的话

translation.en: my favorite appetizer to share, personally, is the petite seafood tower.
translation.zh: ‎我最喜欢的开胃菜是小海鲜塔

translation.en: It has everything.
Has crab claws, Dungeness crab, snow crab, tiger prawns--
I didn't know we were getting food and entertainment.
translation.zh: ‎没想到我们来吃饭还有娱乐项目

translation.en: -It is fun! -Jimmy Jokes.
Hey, are you pitching the tower, the seafood tower to a half-crab?
translation.zh:
‎你是在向一个半人半蟹的生物
‎推荐海鲜塔吗？

translation.en: -Jesus. -Recommending that to me, huh? [laughs]
-That takes a lot of stones. -What is this, the cannibal table?
translation.zh:
‎-需要很大勇气啊
‎-你们这里都吃同类吗？

translation.en: You gonna offer me a 32-year-old woman named Lydia?
translation.zh:
‎你要给我上一个
‎32岁名叫莉迪亚的女人吗？

translation.en: Because I'm 32.
I believe it and I won't offer you that. I'll be sensible next time.
translation.zh:
‎我相信 我不会给你上那个
‎下次我会更小心

translation.en: Connect with your guests better.
I am so sorry, sir. I didn't see your pincers.
translation.zh: ‎非常抱歉 我没看见你的钳子

translation.en: [The Crab] I apologize for raising my voice,
but I got bit on the ball bag by a radioactive crab,
translation.zh: ‎但是我被带辐射的螃蟹咬了下体

translation.en: and I used to love shellfish.
So, my fuse is a little short. This is a trigger environment for me.
translation.zh:
‎所以 我容易发怒
‎餐厅是个容易让我失控的场所

translation.en: -I understand. -Okay.
I'm gonna need a minute. Why don't you take off?
translation.zh: ‎我需要一分钟时间 你先走开吧

translation.en: No problem.
-They're just jealous. -'Cause of who I'm sitting with maybe.
translation.zh:
‎-他们只是嫉妒
‎-可能是因为我和你相对而坐

translation.en: Anything on that menu look good?
I was thinking about chicken, but I was afraid you might be half-chicken.
translation.zh:
‎我在考虑这个鸡肉
‎但我担心你可能有一半是鸡

translation.en: Ha. No, no. Just crab and man.
A lot of man. I was gonna order the chicken too,
translation.zh: ‎一大半是人 ‎我也想点鸡肉呢

translation.en: but unfortunately, I like my chicken the way you get it in the crab traps,
translation.zh:
‎但很不幸 我喜欢的鸡肉
‎是放在捕蟹笼里的那种

translation.en: -and that's raw. -[gasps]
-What happened? -I just got…
Do you like raw chicken, too?
Ever since…
kind of what I've gone through,
physically, I've had a kind of insatiable…
translation.zh: ‎从生理上来说 我就极度

translation.en: craving for raw chicken myself.
Come here.
So, you tracked me down, you know?
What do you wanna know?
I just need to know whose side you're on.
translation.zh: ‎我只需要知道 你站在谁一边

translation.en: What are you doin'?
I'm just butterin' your knuckle.
I know things are weird between us because we had harsh words.
translation.zh:
‎我知道我们相互说了些狠话
‎现在我们之间有点怪怪的

translation.en: Yes, because I threw the city bus even though you said, "Do not."
translation.zh:
‎也是因为我扔了一辆城市公交
‎尽管你不让我扔

translation.en: And it didn't make it any better than whatever the city bus thing did.
translation.zh: ‎而且我扔城市公交还不是最糟糕的

translation.en: It's gonna cost a million dollars and I wish I'd stop talking.
translation.zh:
‎可能造成了一百万美元的损失
‎我真应该闭嘴

translation.en: I'm like, worse than Tom in accounting who's like, "My ledger."
translation.zh:
‎我比财会部的汤姆还差劲
‎他总是说：“我的账簿”

translation.en: He always smells like old lady liniment or like an old lady chafing
translation.zh:
‎他总有一股老太太身上的药膏的味儿
‎就像老太太的擦伤膏

translation.en: and now I'm almost worse than Tom, if that's possible.
translation.zh:
‎现在我几乎连汤姆也不如了
‎如果有人可能比他还差劲的话

translation.en: -Tom, I'm gonna have to call you back. -[Tom] No problem.
translation.zh:
‎-汤姆 我回头打给你
‎-没问题

translation.en: Tom, just ki-- Gotcha! April Fools.
translation.zh: ‎汤姆 我只是…哈哈！愚人节快乐

translation.en: -Just not in April. [laughs] Is he gone? -He's gone.
translation.zh:
‎-不过现在不是四月 他挂了？
‎-他挂了

translation.en: It's, uh, so much more money than a million bucks.
-More? -It's okay. I'm gonna cover it.
translation.zh:
‎-多得多？
‎-没关系 我会赔付的

translation.en: And no one was hurt. Somehow.
translation.zh: ‎而且 没人受伤 万幸

translation.en: Yeah.
I heard you were on a date.
It was really more of a fact-finding mission.
I… I found out what The King is up to.
And that little party he's throwing, it's just like a group funeral.
translation.zh: ‎他举办的派对会是一场集体葬礼

translation.en: He's gonna take those people that didn't vote for him,
translation.zh: ‎他要把所有没投票给他的人抓起来

translation.en: put 'em in a building, blow it to smithereens.
translation.zh: ‎关进一座大楼里 然后把楼炸掉

translation.en: -How did you get this information? -Hmm?
Who told you?
The King's lost it since the election. I'm gonna get out of the game.
translation.zh:
‎自从竞选失败 国王真的疯了
‎我得退出

translation.en: [spluttering] Who-- Who told you? What?
What happened to your buttons?
Ooh, that's a great start. Yep. Ooh.
The Crab? You're saying it negatively.
The Crab? Oh my-- The Crab?
-Now, I-- -I knew you were lookin' at him weird.
translation.zh:
‎-我…
‎-我就知道你看他的眼神不对

translation.en: Don't point at me! Don't point at me! Don't judge-y point at me.
Did you get surf and turfed?
Surf and turf is not a thing. But I did.
translation.zh: ‎没有什么海陆大餐 但是的 我吃了

translation.en: What did I find?
What is that? Did you take that from the restaurant, you little outlaw?
translation.zh:
‎这是什么？你从餐馆偷出来的？
‎你这小贼

translation.en: Of course not. I always keep an Old Bay in my bra.
translation.zh:
‎当然不是 我总是在胸罩里
‎放一瓶老湾调味料

translation.en: You never know when you have to season something tasty.
translation.zh: ‎你永远不知道什么时候需要加点料

translation.en: That's tender. Don't forget Mr. Right.
translation.zh: ‎太温柔了 别忘了右手先生

translation.en: -I couldn't forget about him. Believe it. -Powder, Mommy.
translation.zh:
‎-我怎么会忘了他
‎-撒些粉 亲爱的

translation.en: I'm gonna throw you in that hot tub and have myself a low-country boil!
translation.zh:
‎我要把你扔进浴缸
‎享用一顿海鲜汤锅！

translation.en: He was-- Don't.
He was, you know, very charming.
And he's very good with his…
Honey! He's a crab!
I know, but I love crab.
I know this is gonna sound crazy, but I really think we can trust him.
translation.zh:
‎我知道这听起来很疯狂
‎但我真的认为我们能相信他

translation.en: I don't know we should be getting info from a Miscreant.
translation.zh: ‎我们不能听信恶徒提供的情报

translation.en: Well, he's Half-creant.
Half-Korean?
No. That's what I said. Not "half-Korean," he's a "Half-creant."
translation.zh: ‎不 我也听错了 他不是斑秃 是半徒

translation.en: There's something about him.
Somewhere in there, he's a good guy.
translation.zh: ‎我想在内心深处 他是个好人

translation.en: Coming from me, that might not mean much, because of the bus,
translation.zh:
‎这话从我嘴里说出来 可能没啥意义
‎因为那公交车事件

translation.en: and, you know, I barged in here and took your power,
translation.zh:
‎我还闯进你的实验室
‎抢走了你的超能力

translation.en: which is probably the cooler power,
translation.zh: ‎而且可能是更酷的那一个超能力

translation.en: even before I said it wasn't, but it kind of is.
translation.zh: ‎尽管我曾说不是 但其实是的

translation.en: Oh, Lydi…
Sometimes I don't know if I'm mad at you because you always go crazy
translation.zh:
‎有时候 我不知道我是生你的气
‎因为你总是疯疯癫癫的

translation.en: or if I'm really just mad at myself because…
translation.zh: ‎还是说我其实是生自己的气 因为…

translation.en: I never do.
Well, we can't both be nuts.
Let's just figure out how we can stop The King.
translation.zh: ‎我们还是想想怎么阻止国王吧

translation.en: I know you can do anything you put that big brain to.
translation.zh: ‎凭你的智慧 你想做什么都能做到

translation.en: I mean, look at me.
You made a loser into something special.
translation.zh:
‎你把一个没出息的货
‎变成了一个出类拔萃的人

translation.en: Lydi…
Even though I was dumb enough to let us drift apart,
translation.zh: ‎我太傻 当年和你渐行渐远

translation.en: you've always been special.
translation.zh: ‎但你一直是个出类拔萃的人

translation.en: Thanks, Em.
Not to kill the mood, but Allie's been listening to your entire conversation.
translation.zh:
‎我不想破坏气氛
‎但是你们的对话艾丽都听见了

translation.en: She says you need to wrap up this "after-school special," suit up,
translation.zh:
‎她要你们赶快结束这段
‎青少年人生哲理戏 装备起来

translation.en: and meet her in the tech room. Immediately.
translation.zh: ‎去技术室找她 现在就去

translation.en: Let's go.
[Allie] Bingo, we'll get you in through a back entrance.
translation.zh: ‎宾果 我们帮你从后门进入

translation.en: Once you're in and can determine where the bomb is,
translation.zh: ‎等你进去并找到炸弹在哪里

translation.en: Hammer will follow in, get the bomb,
translation.zh: ‎大锤随后进入 拿走炸弹

translation.en: and get it out of the building, where it can be properly disarmed.
translation.zh:
‎把它带出大楼
‎带到可以妥善拆卸的地方去

translation.en: [Allie] Can you read me?
[Lydia] Hammer down.
-[Emily] What does that mean? -It's lingo for "Yep."
[Allie] Get into position by the door and wait for my signal.
translation.zh: ‎在门边就位 等我的信号

translation.en: This could take a while.
translation.zh: ‎特蕾西 可能不会速战速决

translation.en: Would you go get me more coffee? I wanna be alert.
translation.zh:
‎你能不能再给我来点咖啡？
‎我想保持清醒

translation.en: [Lydia] You hearing music?
It's Seal. I programmed him into the suit.
translation.zh:
‎是席尔 我把他的歌
‎置入我们的战衣了

translation.en: Em, we're on a mission here.
translation.zh: ‎艾米莉 我们在执行任务呢

translation.en: You think I don't know that?
[Emily] There are thousands of lives in danger and we're stuck and I'm nervous.
translation.zh:
‎数千人的生命岌岌可危
‎而我们被困在这里 我很紧张

translation.en: Okay.
We have to succeed, Lydi.
This will give us the relaxed focus to finish the mission.
translation.zh:
‎这首歌可以帮我们放松
‎集中精力完成任务

translation.en: What do I know? I'm nervous too.
I do have to admit, the song's got a good hook.
translation.zh: ‎我得承认 这首歌还真拽耳朵

translation.en: Do you have eyes on them? Answer me.
Watch your mouth. You made a deal with The King, not with me.
translation.zh:
‎说话小心点 你和国王
‎达成了一笔交易 不是和我

translation.en: They are on the loading dock on the south side of the building.
translation.zh: ‎她们在卸货区 大楼的南侧

translation.en: The next right. Other right.
Hurry up! They're not gonna stand there all night.
Wow, you're bad.
Get away from the door, now!
-You okay? -Allie double-crossed us.
The King paid her off. She was leading Laser right to you.
translation.zh:
‎国王收买了她 她把激光女
‎引到你们所在的地方了

translation.en: Your singing sucks.
You know, killing people is not a recognized hobby.
I can't knit.
Time to die!
Time to take out the trash.
-Holy crap! -Some people just deserve a dumpster.
This was a set-up.
Allie's knocked out. Security's on the way.
translation.zh: ‎艾丽被打晕了 保安马上到

translation.en: -I gotta come help. -It's not safe. Stay home.
translation.zh:
‎-我得去帮你们
‎-这里不安全 你留在家里

translation.en: I'm on my way.
[Emily] Tracy?
Let's go.
Who's ready to hear from our next mayor?
translation.zh: ‎大家想不想听下一任市长讲话？

translation.en: I have a cold, a cold, that's why I'm not touching…
translation.zh: ‎我感冒了 所以我不想握手…

translation.en: Thank you. Well, thank you, Mr. King.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 谢谢你 王先生

translation.en: It's The-- It's "The" King.
It's "The" King. "King" is a dog's name. Okay?
Okay.
Oh, is this…
Sorry. Crushin' it.
Is this thing… Can you… Okay. Thank you.
translation.zh: ‎这东西…能不能…好的 谢谢

translation.en: Have a good time.
-Thank you-- -It's gonna be a blast!
This is an excellent example
-of how together, we can revitalize… -Boom. …the city of Chicago.
translation.zh: ‎让我们看到我们可以如何振兴芝加哥

translation.en: Through collaboration and cooperation, we can…
translation.zh: ‎通过团结合作 我们可以…

translation.en: Use your big brain, Em. Where would he hide the bomb?
translation.zh:
‎开动你那智慧的大脑 艾米莉
‎他会把炸弹藏在哪儿呢？

translation.en: The party's on the 30th floor, there'd be security there.
translation.zh: ‎派对在30楼 那里会有保安

translation.en: And the basement's so far away.
But wait, Rachel Gonzales' campaign office is on the 29th floor.
translation.zh:
‎但等一下 瑞秋冈萨雷斯的
‎竞选办公室在29层

translation.en: That's why he picked this building.
-[ding] -Where the hell is Laser? She should be here by now.
From where?
-From killing Thunder Force. -Yeah.
She told me she's gonna make 'em into s'mores, which--
translation.zh: ‎她说要把她们变成烤棉花糖

translation.en: The timing is great because they're really startin' to bug me.
translation.zh:
‎时机正好
‎因为我真的开始讨厌她们了

translation.en: Yeah.
You know, I don't really like this new "crab with a conscience" bit.
translation.zh:
‎你知道 我真的不喜欢
‎这只“良心发现的螃蟹”

translation.en: I like my crab with a little hollandaise sauce, maybe a parsley garnish.
translation.zh:
‎我吃螃蟹喜欢蘸荷兰酱
‎也许再撒点香菜

translation.en: We're good in that.
Do we have a problem?
We don't have a problem. All is good. Let's slaughter them all.
translation.zh:
‎没问题 一切好极了
‎我们把她们都杀光

translation.en: Kill those sons of bitches…
[wheezing] Thanks for the help.
-Kenny, call her. -You've killed Kenny.
translation.zh:
‎-肯尼 给她打电话
‎-你杀死了肯尼

translation.en: I… I did?
Yep.
-Who's left? -Andrew's left.
Yeah, I can call, sir.
translation.zh: ‎对 我可以打电话 先生

translation.en: -Fine. -Oh, ca-- Okay, yeah. Sorry.
Uh, Laser, do you copy?
-[Andrew] Do you copy? -Yeah, kind of.
-What's she saying? -Hmm?
-The red-head threw a dumpster. -A red-head threw a dumpster at her.
translation.zh:
‎-红头发的那个用垃圾箱砸我
‎-红头发的那个用垃圾箱砸她

translation.en: What? Well, did they get away? Where… where are they?
-Put her on speaker phone! -Andrew, you idiot!
translation.zh:
‎-打开免提！
‎-安德鲁 你这个白痴！

translation.en: -Laser, where are they? -No idea. Probably going after the bomb.
translation.zh:
‎-激光女 她们在哪儿？
‎-不知道 可能去找炸弹了

translation.en: After all that.
-Hang up, you stupid… -Down! Hang it up! Moron!
translation.zh:
‎-挂了吧 你这傻瓜
‎-手放下！挂断！白痴！

translation.en: We gotta go back up. Let's end this. Hit 29.
translation.zh: ‎我们回楼上去 了结这件事 按29层

translation.en: Ah, so close.
-Twenty-- -I know, they're not made for, um…
translation.zh:
‎-二十…
‎-我知道 这些按钮不是为…

translation.en: -It'll take us a while. Okay. -Twenty-nine! I'm surrounded by idiots.
translation.zh:
‎-会花一些时间 但是… 好吧
‎-29！我周围一群白痴

translation.en: Sorry.
If you were a narcissistic megalomaniac, where would you hide a bomb?
translation.zh:
‎如果你是个自恋狂人
‎你会把炸弹藏在哪儿？

translation.en: My guess is a place of power. Her office, maybe.
translation.zh:
‎我猜是在一个权力集中的地方
‎也许在她办公室

translation.en: [The King] Well, well…
Evening, ladies. I'm assuming you're both here.
translation.zh: ‎晚上好 女士们 我猜你们俩都在这儿

translation.en: I gotta tell you,
-I'm bummed you're not dead. -I'm sorry to disappoint you, King.
translation.zh:
‎-你们没死我很失望
‎-对不起 让你失望了 王

translation.en: Okay, it's "The" King. Okay?
"The King!" It's three letters! Why doesn't anybody get this?
translation.zh: ‎“国王”！一共两个字！ ‎人们怎么就说不对呢？

translation.en: -It's not tough. -"The King." Like, "The Boss."
You on my left?
[The King] "The man."
-"The bomb." -Nice, sir.
[The King] Thanks. The big, beautiful bomb.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 ‎那枚巨大的漂亮的炸弹

translation.en: You didn't think I was gonna let nagging chicks
translation.zh: ‎你们不会认为我会让两个讨厌的女人

translation.en: get their hands on my big, beautiful bomb, did you?
translation.zh: ‎把我那巨大的漂亮的炸弹搞到手吧？

translation.en: You know what they say about men who claim to have big, big bombs.
translation.zh:
‎你知道 人们说
‎凡是声称自己的炸弹很大的男人

translation.en: Little, tiny fuses.
Ladies, meet the henchmen.
translation.zh: ‎女士们 认识一下我的手下人

translation.en: Hi, I'm Andy or Andrew. Either one.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 我是安迪 或安德鲁 都行

translation.en: Who was that? Was that Andrew?
[The Crab] Yeah.
Damn it! I wanted to kill Andrew.
translation.zh: ‎该死的！我想亲手杀死安德鲁的

translation.en: Enough with the bullets.
Come on, Thunder Force. I'm ready to get my hands dirty.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 雷霆女神 我亲手解决你们

translation.en: Of course. He's a Miscreant, too.
I thought you were just run-of-the-mill dirtbag, but you're a Miscreant dirtbag.
translation.zh:
‎我以为你是个普通的坏蛋
‎但你是个转基因坏蛋

translation.en: You buried the lead on that one, Jerry.
translation.zh: ‎这么重要的信息你却没说 杰瑞

translation.en: -You're a waste of butter, Crab. -I didn't grab the butter.
translation.zh:
‎-你浪费了黄油 螃蟹
‎-我没动那黄油

translation.en: I got a job to do, so let's get this over with.
translation.zh: ‎我还有正事呢 所以我们速战速决吧

translation.en: -Yeah. -Let's dance, dummy.
He's stronger than I thought…
File you under "trash!"
She's got a real sexy violent streak.
What's the matter? Cat got your tongue? Enjoy the ride!
Lydi!
Peekaboo.
Lydi!
Oh, shit!
I have this signature move. It's kind of a hug-of-death thing.
translation.zh: ‎我有个招牌动作 是一种死亡拥抱

translation.en: -[grunts] -You're gonna love it.
-What's that smell? -It's the suits, we can't wash them.
translation.zh:
‎-这是什么味儿？
‎-是战衣的味儿 没法洗

translation.en: Terrible!
This is set to extra-crispy, you donut hole.
translation.zh: ‎我设在了高档 你这个人渣

translation.en: Bye-bye, nerd!
She's not a nerd. She's smart.
translation.zh: ‎她不是书呆子 她很聪明

translation.en: There's a difference.
Tracy, what have you done?
What I had to do, Mom.
"Mom"?
You mean, I get a crack at a family kill?
translation.zh: ‎你是说 我有机会杀掉一家人？

translation.en: You hardly ever get that chance.
But first, you.
Pretty strong for a girl,
translation.zh: ‎作为一个女的 你很强壮

translation.en: but not strong enough.
Hands off.
Jerry…
No problem.
-Mother-- -Traitor!
Bottom feeder!
-Batter up, King! -It's "The" Ki--
That one's outta the park!
I wish you hadn't done that. Are you okay?
translation.zh: ‎我真希望你没有这么做 你没事吧？

translation.en: -You guys needed help. -Jerry, you good?
translation.zh:
‎-你们需要支援
‎-杰瑞 你没事吧？

translation.en: Yeah, good.
Where's the bomb?
-Corner office. -Got it.
Love an ambulance.
Or a vet, you know?
Marine biologist…
Somebody's an overachiever.
Can you disarm it?
Not with the time we have left. It'll have trip wires all over it.
translation.zh: ‎时间不够了 ‎布满了引爆线 我会触发炸弹的

translation.en: I could set it off.
translation.zh: ‎布满了引爆线 我会触发炸弹的

translation.en: [exhales] Good to know.
-Well, let me try. Maybe it'll work. -No, no, I can do it.
translation.zh:
‎-我试试吧 也许能行
‎-不 我可以做到

translation.en: I'm super-fast now. I can just run it out of town.
translation.zh: ‎我非常快 我可以带上它跑到城外

translation.en: Look, we don't know how stable it'll be with your speed.
translation.zh:
‎我们不知道 在你这么快的速度下
‎它是否稳定

translation.en: You've already saved us once today. Your grandparents would be so proud.
translation.zh:
‎今天你已经救我们一次了
‎你的外公外婆会为你骄傲的

translation.en: But if you think I'm gonna let you touch that bomb, you're out of your mind.
translation.zh:
‎但如果你认为我会让你动那颗炸弹
‎那你就是疯了

translation.en: Wait.
Don't do anything crazy.
Nah. I've actually thought this one through.
First time for everything.
No, Lydia.
I can't toss it out the window, people could get hurt.
translation.zh:
‎我不能把它扔出窗户了事
‎可能有人会受伤

translation.en: You know my body can take the impact.
translation.zh: ‎你知道我的身体能承受爆炸的冲击

translation.en: I know we don't have a lot of time, so let me say this.
translation.zh: ‎我们的时间不多了 所以请让我说完

translation.en: If this goes bad, I wanna thank you for being my friend.
translation.zh:
‎如果出现意外
‎我只想感谢你做我的朋友

translation.en: You know, people wondered why we were friends
translation.zh:
‎你知道 人们总是不明白
‎我们怎么会是朋友 因为我们

translation.en: 'cause we're nothing alike,
translation.zh:
‎你知道 人们总是不明白
‎我们怎么会是朋友 因为我们 ‎毫无共同点
‎但我一直相信你会改变世界

translation.en: but I always knew you were gonna change the world.
translation.zh:
‎毫无共同点
‎但我一直相信你会改变世界

translation.en: You're the best person I ever met.
Till I met your kid.
Listen to what your mom says.
I wish I always had.
[stifles sob] I should go.
If the bomb explodes and we're just standing here, that'd be weird.
translation.zh:
‎如果炸弹爆炸 而我们就这么站着
‎那就太奇怪了

translation.en: Lydi…
Lydi!
[Emily] Lydia!
No…
Oh, no, no… stop! Stop!
Lydi?
-Oh, no! Lydia! -Lydia? Oh my god…
[Emily] Lydi…
I'm sorry.
Oh, I'm sorry.
I barfed river water on you.
That was so much.
I really, really, really love this suit.
I really love it, and I don't even care if it's stinky anymore.
translation.zh:
‎我真的好爱它 哪怕臭烘烘的
‎我也不在乎

translation.en: -[Tracy laughs] -We're just so happy you're alive.
-I love you guys. -We love you, honey.
translation.zh:
‎-我爱你们
‎-我们爱你 亲爱的

translation.en: -Help her up. -Oh god, help a girl up!
translation.zh:
‎-帮她起来
‎-哎哟 帮我起来

translation.en: Quite a reaction.
Thunder Force, I wanna thank you,
translation.zh: ‎雷霆女神 我想感谢你们

translation.en: and the city of Chicago wants to thank you for your tremendous bravery.
translation.zh:
‎整个芝加哥都想为你们的勇敢
‎向你们表示感谢

translation.en: -Thank you, Mayor. -Yes.
Where's The King?
In custody. Alive.
You did it, Em.
You brought a Miscreant to justice.
You finished the work your parents started.
translation.zh: ‎你完成了你父母未完成的事业

translation.en: -What about Laser? -We're still lookin'.
When you catch her, and before she goes to prison,
translation.zh: ‎等你们抓住她 把她送进监狱之前

translation.en: can I have a couple minutes? I wanna cut that ponytail off.
translation.zh:
‎我能不能见见她？
‎我想把她的马尾辫剪掉

translation.en: Is that a Samson and Delilah thing?
translation.zh: ‎你以为她的超能力来自头发？

translation.en: I just think she'll look really dumb with the short hai-- [retches]
translation.zh: ‎我只是觉得 她留短头发会很傻

translation.en: Okay, I think I'm done.
May I empty your shoes?
-No, no, no, they're fine. -Okay, sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-不用 没关系
‎-好的 对不起

translation.en: I just-- This might be an awkward time to ask you,
but I wonder
if your team would like to make an official arrangement with the city.
translation.zh:
‎你们的团队是否愿意
‎正式与市政府合作？

translation.en: Uh, yeah.
Uh, yeah. Right?
-Oh, that we would. -Perfect.
-The press is ready for a statement. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-记者准备好听我们发表声明了
‎-谢谢

translation.en: Ladies. Thank you.
Bye.
Thank you, Mayor.
I'll drive us home.
You have to sit on my lap or get in the trunk.
translation.zh: ‎你坐我腿上 还是坐后备箱里？

translation.en: Oh. Psh. I'll race you home.
-Why can't I drive? -They just pulled you out of a river.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么不能让我开车？
‎-他们刚把你从河里捞上来

translation.en: Last time I got pulled out of the river, I drove right away.
translation.zh:
‎上一次我被人从河里捞上来
‎我马上就开车了

translation.en: [crowd chanting] Thunder Force!
[continuing chanting] Thunder Force!
What? What?
We got you, Chicago!
You remembered.
Pretty romantic. Look at that.
Look at you get after it.
Let me at least… feed you.
-Thank you. -Come on. Knock-knock.
That's a good girl. Right down the hatch.
Oh god…
Make room for more.
translation.zh: ‎留着点肚子 还有更多呢

translation.en: Oh, my turn? Oh, mmm.
Or our turn.
Yeah. Oh? Yeah?
[chanting] Thunder Force! Thunder Force! Thunder Force! Thunder Force!
